GV03sb_08_u:1: prāṇabhṛta upadadhāti | prāṇā vai prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇānevaitadupadadhāti tāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:2: prathamāyāṃ citā upadadhāti pūrvārdha eṣo 'gneryatprathamā citiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:5: tā daśa-daśopadadhāti | daśa vai prāṇā yadu vā api bahu kṛtvo daśa-daśa daśaiva
GV03sb_08_u:6: tṛtpañca kṛtvo daśa-daśopadadhāti pañca vā etānpaśūnupadadhāti daśa-daśa vā
GV03sb_08_u:11: yadveva prāṇabhṛta upadadhāti | prajāpatervisrastātprāṇā udakrāmandevatā bhūtvā
GV03sb_08_u:12: tānabravīdupa meta prati ma etaddhatta yena me yūyamudakramiṣṭeti sa vai
GV03sb_08_u:13: tadannaṃ sṛjasva yatte vayam paśyanta upavasāmeti te vā ubhaye sṛjāmahā iti tatheti
GV03sb_08_u:16: sa purastādupadadhāti | ayam puro bhuva ityagnirvai purastadyattamāha pura iti
GV03sb_08_u:17: prāñcaṃ hyagnimuddharanti prāñcamupacarantyatha yadbhuva ityāhāgnirvai bhuvo
GV03sb_08_u:18: 'gnerhīdaṃ sarvam bhavati prāṇo hāgnirbhūtvā purastāttasthau tadeva
GV03sb_08_u:21: tasya prāṇo bhauvāyana iti | prāṇaṃ tasmādrūpādagnerniramimīta vasantaḥ prāṇāyana
GV03sb_08_u:22: iti vasantamṛtum prāṇānniramimīta gāyatrī vāsantīti gāyatrīṃ cando
GV03sb_08_u:23: vasantādṛtorniramimīta gāyatryai gāyatramiti gāyatryai candaso gāyatraṃ sāma
GV03sb_08_u:28: vasiṣṭha ṛṣiriti | prāṇo vai vasiṣṭha ṛṣiryadvai nu śreṣṭhastena vasiṣṭho 'tho
GV03sb_08_u:29: yadvastṛtamo vasati teno eva vasiṣṭhaḥ prajāpatigṛhītayā tvayeti prajāpatisṛṣṭayā
GV03sb_08_u:30: tvayetyetatprāṇaṃ gṛhṇāmi prajābhya iti prāṇam purastātprāpādayata nānopadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:31: ye nānākāmāḥ prāṇe tāṃstaddadhāti sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tatprāṇaṃ karotyatha yannānā
GV03sb_08_u:32: sādayetprāṇaṃ ha vicindyātsaiṣā trivṛdiṣṭakā yajuḥ sādanaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:35: atha dakṣiṇataḥ | ayaṃ dakṣiṇā viśvakarmetyayaṃ vai vāyurviśvakarmā yo 'yam
GV03sb_08_u:36: pavata eṣa hīdaṃ sarvaṃ karoti tadyattamāha dakṣiṇeti tasmādeṣa dakṣiṇaiva
GV03sb_08_u:37: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ vāti mano ha vāyurbhūtvā dakṣiṇatastasthau tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:39: tasya mano vaiśvakarmaṇamiti | manastasmādrūpādvāyorniramimīta grīṣmo mānasa
GV03sb_08_u:40: iti grīṣmamṛtum manaso niramimīta triṣṭubgraiṣmīti triṣṭubhaṃ cando
GV03sb_08_u:41: grīṣmādṛtorniramimīta triṣṭubhaḥ svāramiti triṣṭubhaścandasaḥ svāraṃ sāma
GV03sb_08_u:46: bharadvāja ṛṣiriti | mano vai bharadvāja ṛṣirannaṃ vājo yo vai mano bibharti so
GV03sb_08_u:47: 'nnaṃ vājam bharati tasmānmano bharadvāja ṛṣiḥ prajāpatigṛhītayā tvayeti
GV03sb_08_u:48: prajāpatisṛṣṭayā tvayetyetanmano gṛhṇāmi prajābhya iti mano dakṣiṇataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:49: prāpādayata nānopadadhāti ye nānākāmā manasi tāṃstaddadhāti sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:50: tanmanaḥ karotyatha yannānā sādayenmano ha vicindyātsaiṣā trivṛdiṣṭakā tasyokto
GV03sb_08_u:53: atha paścāt | ayam paścādviśvavyacā ityasau vā ādityo viśvavyacā yadā hyevaiṣa
GV03sb_08_u:54: udetyathedaṃ sarvaṃ vyaco bhavati tadyattamāha paścāditi tasmādetam
GV03sb_08_u:55: pratyañcameva yantam paśyanti cakṣurhādityo bhūtvā paścāttasthau tadeva
GV03sb_08_u:59: varṣāścākṣuṣya iti varṣā ṛtuṃ cakṣuṣo niramimīta jagatī vārṣīti jagatīṃ cando
GV03sb_08_u:60: varṣābhya ṛtorniramimīta jagatyā ṛkṣamamiti jagatyai candasa ṛkṣamaṃ sāma
GV03sb_08_u:67: tvayetyetaccakṣurgṛhṇāmi prajābhya iti cakṣuḥ paścātprāpādayata nānopadadhāti ye
GV03sb_08_u:68: nānākāmāścakṣuṣi tāṃstaddadhāti sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ taccakṣuḥ karotyatha yannānā
GV03sb_08_u:71: athottarataḥ | idamuttarātsvariti diśo vā uttarāttadyattā āhottarādityuttarā
GV03sb_08_u:72: hyasmātsarvasmāddiśo 'tha yatsvarityāha svargo hi loko diśaḥ śrotraṃ ha diśo
GV03sb_08_u:75: tasya śrotraṃ sauvamiti | śrotraṃ tasmādrūpāddigbhyo niramimīta śaracrautrīti
GV03sb_08_u:82: viśvāmitra ṛṣiriti | śrotraṃ vai viśvāmitra ṛṣiryadenena sarvataḥ śṛṇotyatho yadasmai
GV03sb_08_u:83: sarvato mitram bhavati tasmācrotraṃ viśvāmitra ṛṣiḥ prajāpatigṛhītayā tvayeti
GV03sb_08_u:84: prajāpatisṛṣṭayā tvayetyetacrotraṃ gṛhṇāmi prajābhya iti śrotramuttarataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:85: prāpādayata nānopadadhāti ye nānākāmāḥ śrotre tāṃstaddadhāti sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:86: tacrotraṃ karotyatha yannānā sādayecrotraṃ ha vicindyātsaiṣā trivṛdiṣṭakā tasyokto
GV03sb_08_u:89: atha madhye | iyamupari matiriti candramā vā upari tadyattamāhoparotyupari hi
GV03sb_08_u:90: candramā atha yanmatirityāha vāgvai matirvācā hīdaṃ sarvam manute vāggha
GV03sb_08_u:93: tasyai vāṅnātyeti | vācaṃ tasmādrūpāccandramaso niramimīta hemanto vācya iti
GV03sb_08_u:94: hemantamṛtuṃ vāco niramimīta paṅktirhaimantīti paṅktiṃ cando
GV03sb_08_u:95: hemantādṛtorniramimīta paṅktyai nidhanavaditi paṅktyai candaso nidhanavatsāma
GV03sb_08_u:96: niramimīta nidhanavata āgrayaṇa iti nidhanavataḥ sāmna āgrayaṇaṃ grahaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:101: viśvakarma ṛṣiriti | vāgvai viśvakarma 'rṣirvācā hīdaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:103: tvayetyetadvācaṃ gṛhṇāmi prajābhya iti vācamupariṣṭātprāpādayata nānopadadhāti ye
GV03sb_08_u:104: nānākāmā vāci tāṃstaddadhāti sakṛtsādayatyekāṃ tadvācaṃ karotyatha yannānā
GV03sb_08_u:105: sādayedvācaṃ ha vicindyātsaiṣā trivṛdiṣṭakā tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:107: etadvai tadannam | yattatprāṇāśca prajāpatiścāsṛjantaitāvānvai sarvo yajño yajña u
GV03sb_08_u:112: evāsminnetatkṛtsnamannaṃ dadhāti tā haitā virāja etānprāṇānbibhrati
GV03sb_08_u:115: tadāhuḥ | kim prāṇāḥ kim prāṇabhṛta iti prāṇā eva prāṇā aṅgāni prāṇabhṛntyaṅgāni
GV03sb_08_u:117: prāṇānbibhrati prāṇāstveva prāṇā annam prāṇabhṛdannaṃ hi prāṇānbibharti
GV03sb_08_u:119: tadāhuḥ | kathamasyaitāḥ sarvāḥ prājāpatyā bhavantīti yadeva sarvāsvāha
GV03sb_08_u:120: prajāpatigṛhītayā tvayetyevamu hāsyaitāḥ sarvāḥ prājāpatyā bhavanti
GV03sb_08_u:123: kasmātpurastādgrahāṇāmṛcaśca sāmāni copadadhātīti saṃsthā vai karmaṇo
GV03sb_08_u:124: 'nvīkṣitavya 'rcā vai pratipadā graho gṛhyata ṛci sāma gīyate
GV03sb_08_u:129: tadāhuḥ | yadetattrayaṃ saha kriyate graha stotraṃ śastramathātra grahaṃ caiva
GV03sb_08_u:130: stotraṃ copadadhāti kathamasyātrāpi śasramupahitaṃ yadvāva stotraṃ tacastraṃ yāsu
GV03sb_08_u:131: hyeva stuvate tā u evānuśaṃsatyevamu hāsyātrāpi śastramupahitam bhavati
GV03sb_08_u:133: tadāhuḥ | yadyathā pituḥ putramevaṃ trīṇi prathamānyāhātha kasmādṛkṣāmayoḥ
GV03sb_08_u:134: saṃkrāmatīti sāma vā ṛcaḥ patistadyattatrāpi yathā pituḥ putramevam brūyādyathā
GV03sb_08_u:135: patiṃ santam putram brūyāttādṛktattasmādṛkṣāmayoḥ saṃkrāmati kasmādu triḥ
GV03sb_08_u:136: saṃtanotīti pitaram putram pautraṃ tāṃstatsaṃtanoti tasmādu tebhya eka eva dadāti
GV03sb_08_u:138: tadyāḥ purastādupadadhāti | tāḥ prāṇabhṛto 'tha yāḥ paścāttāścakṣurbhṛtastā
GV03sb_08_u:139: apānabhṛto 'tha yā dakṣiṇatastā manobhṛtastā u vyānabhṛto 'tha yā uttaratastāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:140: śrotrabhṛtastā udānabhṛto 'tha yā madhye tā vāgbhṛtastā u samānabhṛtaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:142: tadu ha carakādhvaryavaḥ | anyā evāpānabhṛto vyānabhṛta udānabhṛtaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:143: samānabhṛtaścakṣurbhṛto manobhṛtaḥ śrotrabhṛto vāgbhṛta ityupadadhati na tathā
GV03sb_08_u:146: sa vai purastādupadhāya paścādupadadhāti | prāṇo hāpāno bhūtvāṅgulyagrebhya iti
GV03sb_08_u:147: saṃcaratyapāna u ha prāṇo bhūtvāṅgulyagrebhya iti saṃcarati tadyatpurastādupadhāya
GV03sb_08_u:148: paścādupadadhātyenāvevaitatprāṇau saṃtanoti saṃdadhāti tasmādetau prāṇau saṃtatau
GV03sb_08_u:151: atha dakṣiṇata upadhāyottarata upadadhāti | vyāno hodāno bhūtvāṅgulyagrebhya iti
GV03sb_08_u:152: saṃcaratyudāna u ha vyāno bhūtvāṅgulyagrebhya iti saṃcarati tadyaddakṣiṇata
GV03sb_08_u:153: upadhāyottarata upadadhātyetāvevaitatprāṇau saṃtanoti saṃdadhāti tasmādetau prāṇau
GV03sb_08_u:156: atha yā madhya upadadhāti | sa prāṇastā retaḥsicorvelayopadadhāti pṛṣṭayo vai
GV03sb_08_u:157: retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyata evāsminnetatprāṇaṃ dadhāti sarvata
GV03sb_08_u:158: upadadhāti sarvata evāsminnetatprāṇaṃ dadhātyatho evaṃ haiṣa gudaḥ prāṇaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:159: samantaṃ nābhim paryakno nūcīśca tiraścīścopadadhāti tasmādime 'nvañcaśca
GV03sb_08_u:163: tā haike puruṣamupārpyopadadhati | eṣa vai prāṇastametā bibhrati yatprāṇam
GV03sb_08_u:164: bibhrati tasmātprāṇabhṛta iti na tathā kuryādeṣo 'haiva prāṇo ya eṣa hiraṇmayaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:166: nābhiprāpnuyuḥ prāṇo hāsya tadaṅgaṃ nābhiprāpnuyādyadu vai prāṇo 'ṅgaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:167: nābhiprāpnoti śuṣyati vā vai tanmlāyati vā tasmādenāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:168: pariśritsvevopārpyopadadhyādatha yā madhya upadadhāti tābhirasyaiṣa ātmā
GV03sb_08_u:171: tadāhuḥ | yadayam puro bhuvo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇā viśvakarmāyam paścādviśvavyacā
GV03sb_08_u:173: akṣṇayādeśeṣūpadadhātīti prāṇā vai prāṇabhṛtastā yatsamprati diśa
GV03sb_08_u:174: upadadhyātprāgapaṃ haivāyam prāṇaḥ saṃcaredatha yadenā evamabhyanūktāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:178: sa eṣa paśuryadagniḥ | so 'traiva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ saṃskṛtastasya yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:179: purastādupadadhāti tau bāhū atha yāḥ paścātte sakthyāvatha yā madhya upadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:180: sa ātmā tā retaḥsicorvelayopadadhāti pṛṣṭayo vai retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo
GV03sb_08_u:181: madhyato hyayamātmā sarvata upadadhāti sarvato hyayamātmā
GV03sb_08_u:184: kasmādatra dvau stomau dve pṛṣṭhe upadadhātītyātmā vā asyaiṣa ātmānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:185: tadaṅgānāṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ vīryavattamaṃ karoti tasmādayamātmāṅgānāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:188: tadāhuḥ | kathamasyaiṣo 'gniḥ sarvaḥ kṛtsna iṣṭakāyāmiṣṭakāyāṃ saṃskṛto bhavatīti
GV03sb_08_u:189: majjā yajurasthīṣṭakā māṃsaṃ sādanaṃ tvakṣūdadohā loma purīṣasya yajurannam
GV03sb_08_u:190: purīṣamevamu hāsyaiṣo 'gniḥ sarvaḥ kṛtsna iṣṭakāyāmiṣṭakāyāṃ saṃskṛto bhavati
GV03sb_08_u:192: sa eṣa sārvāyuṣo 'gniḥ | sa yo haitamevaṃ sārvāyuṣamagniṃ veda sarvaṃ haivāyureti
GV03sb_08_u:195: samañcanaprasāraṇenetyabhimṛśanti paśureṣa yadagniryadā vai paśuraṅgāni saṃ
GV03sb_08_u:196: cāñcati pra ca sārayatyatha sa tairvīryaṃ karoti
GV03sb_08_u:200: kalpantāṃ saṃvatsaraste kalpatām pretyā etyai saṃ cāñca pra ca sāraya suparṇācidasi
GV03sb_08_u:203: api ha smāha śāṭyāyaniḥ | sphoṭatorhaikaḥ pakṣayorupaśuśrāvaitenābhimṛṣṭasya
GV03sb_08_u:206: atha ha smāha svarhinnāgnajitaḥ | nagnajidvā gāndhāraḥ prāṇo vai
GV03sb_08_u:207: samañcanaprasāraṇaṃ yasminvā aṅge prāṇo bhavati tatsaṃ cāñcati pra ca sārayati
GV03sb_08_u:209: tathā saṃ cāñcati pra ca sārayatīti tadahaiva samañcanaprasāraṇaṃ yatsa taduvāca
GV03sb_08_u:210: rājanyabandhuriva tveva taduvāca yannu śataṃ kṛtvo 'tho sahasram
GV03sb_08_u:211: bahiṣṭādabhyanyurna vai tasmiṃste prāṇaṃ dadhyuryo vā ātmanprāṇaḥ sa eva
GV03sb_08_u:213: tathā saṃ cāñcati pra ca sārayatyatha lokampṛṇe upadadhātyasyāṃ sraktyāṃ tayorupari
GV03sb_08_u:216: dvitīyāṃ citimupadadhāti | etadvai devāḥ prathamāṃ citiṃ citvā samārohannayaṃ vai
GV03sb_08_u:217: lokaḥ prathamā citirimameva tallokaṃ saṃskṛtya samārohan
GV03sb_08_u:219: te 'bruvan | cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti te
GV03sb_08_u:223: te 'śvināvabruvan | yuvaṃ vai brahmāṇau bhiṣajau stho yuvaṃ na imāṃ dvitīyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:224: citimupadhattamiti kiṃ nau tato bhaviṣyatīti yuvameva no 'syā agnicityāyā adhvaryū
GV03sb_08_u:225: bhaviṣyatha iti tatheti tebhya etāmaśvinau dvitīyāṃ citimupādhattāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:228: sa upadadhāti | dhruvakṣitirdhruvayonirdhruvāsīti yadvai sthiraṃ yatpratiṣṭhitaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:229: taddhruvamatha vā eṣāmeṣa loko 'dhruva ivāpratiṣṭhita iva
GV03sb_08_u:230: manasyāsīttamevaitatsthiraṃ dhruvaṃ kṛtvā pratyadhattāṃ dhruvaṃ yonimāsīda
GV03sb_08_u:231: sādhuyeti sthiraṃ yonimāsīda sādhuyetyetadukhyasya ketum prathamaṃ juṣāṇetyayaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:235: kulāyinī ghṛtavatī puraṃdhiriti | kulāyamiva vai dvitīyā citiḥ syone sīda sadane
GV03sb_08_u:236: pṛthivyā iti pṛthivī vai prathamā citistasyai śive syone sīda sadana ityetadabhi tvā
GV03sb_08_u:237: rudrā vasavo gṛṇantvityetāstvāṃ devatā abhigṛṇantvityetadimā brahma pīpihi
GV03sb_08_u:241: svairdakṣairdakṣapiteha sīdeti | svena vīryeṇeha sīdetyetaddevānāṃ samne bṛhate
GV03sb_08_u:242: raṇāyeti devānāṃ sumnāya mahate raṇāyetyetatpitevaidhi sūnava ā suśeveti yathā pitā
GV03sb_08_u:243: putrāya syonaḥ suśeva evaṃ suśevaidhītyetatsvāveśā tanvā saṃviśāsvetyātmā vai tanūḥ
GV03sb_08_u:247: pṛthivyāḥ purīṣamasīti | pṛthivī vai prathamā citistasyā etatpurīṣamiva
GV03sb_08_u:248: yaddvitīyāpso nāmeti raso nāmetyetattāṃ tvā viśve abhigṛṇantu devā iti tāṃ tvā sarve
GV03sb_08_u:249: 'bhigṛṇantu devā ityetatstomapṛṣṭhā ghṛtavatīha sīdeti yāntstomānasyāṃ taṃsyamāno
GV03sb_08_u:250: bhavati taireṣā stomapṛṣṭhā prajāvadasme draviṇāyajasveti prajāvadasme
GV03sb_08_u:254: tā etā diśaḥ | tā retaḥsicorvelayopadadhātīme vai retaḥsicāvanayostaddiśo dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:255: tasmādanayordiśaḥ sarvata upadadhāti sarvatastaddiśo dadhāti tasmātsarvato diśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:256: sarvataḥ samīcīḥ sarvatastatsamīcīrdiśo dadhāti tasmātsarvataḥ samīcyo diśastā
GV03sb_08_u:257: nānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasā 'dhivadati nānā hi diśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:259: atha pañcamīṃ diśyāmupadadhāti | ūrdhvā ha sā dikṣā yā sordhvā digasau sa ādityo
GV03sb_08_u:261: tadādityamantareṇa dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ dadhāti tasmādeṣo 'ntareṇa dakṣiṇāṃ diśameti
GV03sb_08_u:263: adityāstvā pṛṣṭhe sādayāmīti | iyaṃ vā aditirasyāmevainametatpratiṣṭhāyām
GV03sb_08_u:266: diśāmadhipatirbhuvanānāmūrmirdrapso apāmasīti raso vā ūrmirviśvakarmā ta ṛṣiriti
GV03sb_08_u:270: yadvevaitā āśvinīrupadadhāti | prajāpatiṃ visrastaṃ devatā ādāya vyudakrāmaṃstasya
GV03sb_08_u:273: tāvabravīt | upa metam prati ma etaddhattaṃ yena me yuvamuda !kramiṣṭamiti kiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:274: nau tato bhaviṣyatīti yuvaddevatyameva ma etadātmano bhaviṣyatīti tatheti
GV03sb_08_u:277: tadyā etāḥ pañcāśvinyaḥ | etadasya tadātmanastadyadetā atropadadhāti yadevāsyaitā
GV03sb_08_u:284: kulāyinī ghṛtavatī puraṃdhiriti | kulāyamiva vā asyaitadātmanaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:286: purīṣamasīti purīṣasaṃhitamiva vā asyaitadātmano retaḥsicorvelayā pṛṣṭayo vai
GV03sb_08_u:287: retaḥsicau pṛṣṭisācayamiva vā asyaitadātmanaḥ sarvata upadadhāti sarvato
GV03sb_08_u:290: atha 'rtavye upadadhāti | ṛtava ete yadṛtavye ṛtūnevaitadupadadhāti śukraśca śuciśca
GV03sb_08_u:291: graiṣmāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine etadupadadhāti dve iṣṭake
GV03sb_08_u:292: bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ karoti
GV03sb_08_u:294: tadyadete atropadadhāti | saṃvatsara eṣo 'gnirima u lokāḥ saṃvatsarastasya
GV03sb_08_u:295: yadūrdhvam pṛthivyā arvācīnamantarikṣāttadasyaiṣā dvitīyāṃ citistadvasya grīṣma
GV03sb_08_u:298: yadvevaite atropadadhāti | prajāpatireṣo 'gniḥ saṃvatsara u prajāpatistasya
GV03sb_08_u:299: yadūrdhvam pratiṣṭhāyā avācīnam madhyāttadasyaiṣā dvitīyā citistadvasya grīṣma
GV03sb_08_u:303: atha vaiśvadevīrupadadhāti | eṣā vai sā dvītīyā citiryāmebhyastadaśvinā upādhattāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:306: te devā abruvan | aśvinau vā idaṃ sarvamabhūtāmupa tajjānīta yathā
GV03sb_08_u:308: yathā vayamihāpyasāmeti te cetayamānā etā iṣṭakā apaśyanvaiśvadevīḥ
GV03sb_08_u:315: yadveva vaiśvadevīrupadadhāti | ye vai te viśve devā etāṃ dvitīyāṃ citimapaśyanye ta
GV03sb_08_u:316: etena rasenopāyaṃsta ete tānevaitadupadadhāti tā etāḥ sarvāḥ prajāstā
GV03sb_08_u:318: prajāḥ sarvata upadadhāti sarvatastatprajā dadhāti tasmātsarvataḥ prajā diśyā
GV03sb_08_u:319: anūpadadhāti dikṣu tatprajā dadhāti tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu prajāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:322: udakrāmannetasyā adhi yonestā enametasminnātmanaḥ pratihite prāpadyanta
GV03sb_08_u:324: sa yaḥ sa prajāpatirvyasraṃsata | ayameva sa yo 'yamagniścīyate 'tha yā asmāttāḥ prajā
GV03sb_08_u:325: madhyata udakrāmannetāstā vaiśvadevya iṣṭakāstadyadetā upadadhāti yā evāsmāttāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:326: prajā madhyata udakrāmaṃstā asminnetatprapādayati retaḥsicorvelayā pṛṣṭayo vai
GV03sb_08_u:327: retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyata evāsminnetāḥ prajāḥ prapādayati sarvata
GV03sb_08_u:331: 'kāmayata prajāḥ sṛjeya prajāyeyeti sa ṛtubhiradbhiḥ prāṇaiḥ saṃvatsareṇāśvibhyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:333: sayugbhūtvaitāḥ prajāḥ prajanayati tasmādu sarvāsveva sajūḥ-sajūrityanuvartate
GV03sb_08_u:336: prājanayatsajūrvidhābhirityāpo vai vidhā adbhirhīdaṃ sarvaṃ vihitamadbhirvai
GV03sb_08_u:338: sajūrdevairvayonādhairiti prāṇā vai devā vayonādhāḥ prāṇairhīdaṃ sarvaṃ vayunaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:339: naddhamatho candāṃsi vai devā vayonādhāścandobhirhīdaṃ sarvaṃ vayunaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:340: naddham prāṇairvai sayugbhūtvā prājanayadagnaye tvā vaiśvānarāyeti saṃvatsaro vā
GV03sb_08_u:341: agnirvaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsareṇa vai sayugbhūtvā prājanayadaśvinādhvaryū sādayatāmiha
GV03sb_08_u:348: sayugbhūtvā prājanayadatha yannānā madhyato 'nyā-anyā hi prajā madhyataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:351: atha prāṇabhṛta upadadhāti | etadvai devā abruvaṃścetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva
GV03sb_08_u:356: retaḥsicorvelayeme vai retaḥsicāvanayostadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmādanayorvāyuḥ sarvata
GV03sb_08_u:357: upadadhāti sarvatastadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvato vāyuḥ sarvataḥ samīcīḥ
GV03sb_08_u:358: sarvatastatsamyañcaṃ vāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvataḥ samyaṅbhūtvā sarvābhyo digbhyo
GV03sb_08_u:359: vāti diśyā anūpadadhāti dikṣu tadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu vāyuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:361: yadveva prāṇabhṛta upadadhāti | āsvevaitatprajāsu prāṇāndadhāti tā anantarhitā
GV03sb_08_u:363: pāhyapānam me pāhi vyānam me pāhi cakṣurma urvyā bibhāhi śrotram me
GV03sb_08_u:366: athāpasyā upadadhāti | etadvai devā abruvaṃścetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva
GV03sb_08_u:370: apasyā upadadhāti | āpo vai vṛṣṭirvṛṣṭimevāsminnetaddadhāti retaḥsicorvelayeme vai
GV03sb_08_u:372: sarvatastadvṛṣṭiṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvato varṣati sarvataḥ samīcīḥ sarvatastamīcīṃ
GV03sb_08_u:373: vṛṣṭiṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvataḥ samyaṅbhūtvā sarvābhyo digbhyo varṣati vāyavyā
GV03sb_08_u:374: anūpadadhāti vāyau tadvṛṣṭiṃ dadhāti tasmādyāṃ diśaṃ vāyureti tāṃ diśaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:377: yadvevāpasyā upadadhāti | eṣvevaitatprāṇeṣvapo dadhāti tā antarhitāḥ prāṇabhṛdbhya
GV03sb_08_u:379: tatprāṇebhyo 'nnaṃ dadhātyapaḥ pinvauṣadhīrjinva dvipādava catuṣpātpāhi divo
GV03sb_08_u:382: atha candasyā upadadhāti | etadvai devā abruvaṃścetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva
GV03sb_08_u:386: candasyā upadadhāti | paśavo vai candāṃsi paśūnevāsminnetaddadhāti sarvata
GV03sb_08_u:390: yadveva candasyā upadadhāti | prajāpatervisrastātpaśava udakrāmaṃścandāṃsi bhūtvā
GV03sb_08_u:391: tāngāyatrī cando bhūtvā vayasāpnottadyadgāyatryāpnodetaddhi canda āśiṣṭhaṃ sā
GV03sb_08_u:394: mūrdhā vaya iti | prajāpatirvai mūrdhā sa vayo 'bhavatprajāpatiścanda iti
GV03sb_08_u:397: kṣatraṃ vaya iti | prajāpatirvai kṣatraṃ sa vayo 'bhavanmayaṃdaṃ canda iti yadvā
GV03sb_08_u:398: aniruktaṃ tanmayaṃdamanirukto vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatireva cando 'bhavat
GV03sb_08_u:400: viṣṭambho vaya iti | prajāpatirvai viṣṭambhaḥ sa vayo 'bhavadadhipatiścanda iti
GV03sb_08_u:403: viśvakarmā vaya iti | prajāparirvai viśvakarmā sa vayo 'bhavatparameṣṭhī canda
GV03sb_08_u:404: ityāpo vai prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī tā hi parame sthāne tiṣṭhanti prajāpatireva
GV03sb_08_u:407: tāni vā etāni | catvāri vayāṃsi catvāri candāṃsi tadaṣṭāvaṣṭākṣarā gāyatryeṣā vai sā
GV03sb_08_u:408: gāyatrī yā tadbhūtvā prajāpatiretānpaśūnvayasāpnottasmājjīrṇam paśuṃ vayasāpta
GV03sb_08_u:409: ityācakṣate tasmādu sarvāsveva vayo vaya ityamuvartate 'tha ye 'smātte paśava
GV03sb_08_u:410: udakrāmannete te pañcadaśottare vajro vai paśavo vajraḥ pañcadaśastasmādyasya
GV03sb_08_u:411: paśavo bhavantyapaiva sa pāpmānaṃ hate vajro haiva tasya pāpmānamapahanti
GV03sb_08_u:412: tasmādyāṃ kāṃ ca diśam paśumāneti vajravihitāṃ haiva tāmanveti
GV03sb_08_u:414: basto vaya iti bastaṃ vayasāpnodvivalaṃ canda ityekapadā vai vivalaṃ canda ekapadā
GV03sb_08_u:417: vṛṣṇirvaya iti | vṛṣṇiṃ vayasāpnodviśālaṃ canda iti dvipadā vai viśālaṃ cando dvipadā
GV03sb_08_u:420: puruṣo vaya iti | puruṣaṃ vayasāpnottandraṃ canda iti paṅktirvai tandraṃ candaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:423: vyāghro vaya iti | vyāghraṃ vayasāpnodanādhṛṣṭaṃ canda iti virāḍvā anādhṛṣṭaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:424: cando 'nnaṃ vai virāḍannamanādhṛṣṭaṃ virāḍṛ bhūtvā vyāghrā uccakramuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:426: siṃho vaya iti | siṃhaṃ vayasāpnoccadiścanda ityaticandā vai cadiścandaḥ sā hi sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:427: candāṃsi cādayatyaticandā ha bhūtvā siṃhā uccakramurathāto niruktāneva
GV03sb_08_u:430: paṣṭhavāḍvaya iti | paṣṭhavāhaṃ vayasāpnodbṛhatī canda iti bṛhatī ha bhūtvā
GV03sb_08_u:433: ukṣā vaya iti | ukṣāṇaṃ vayasāpnotkakupcanda iti kakubbha bhūtvokṣāṇa
GV03sb_08_u:436: ṛṣabho vaya iti | ṛṣabhaṃ vayasāpnotsatobṛhatī canda iti satobṛhatī ha bhūtva
GV03sb_08_u:439: anaḍvānvaya iti | anaḍvāhaṃ vayasāpnotpaṅktiścanda iti paṅktirha bhūtvānaḍvāha
GV03sb_08_u:442: dhenurvaya iti | dhenuṃ vayasāpnojjagatī canda iti jagatī ha bhūtvā dhenava
GV03sb_08_u:445: tryavirvaya iti | tryaviṃ vayasāpnottriṣṭupcanda iti triṣṭubbha bhūtvā tryavaya
GV03sb_08_u:448: divyavāḍvaya iti | dityavāhaṃ vayasāpnodvirāṭ canda iti virāḍa bhūtvā dityavāha
GV03sb_08_u:451: pañcāvirvaya iti | pañcāviṃ vayasāpnodgāyatrī canda iti gāyatrī ha bhūtvā pañcāvaya
GV03sb_08_u:454: trivatso vaya iti | trivatsaṃ vayasāpnoduṣṇikcanda ityuṣṇiggha bhūtvā trivatsā
GV03sb_08_u:457: turyavāḍvaya iti | turyavāhaṃ vayasāptodanuṣṭupcanda ityanuṣṭubbha bhūtvā
GV03sb_08_u:460: ete vai te paśavaḥ | yāṃstatprajāpatirvayasāpnotsa vai paśum prathamamāhātha vayo
GV03sb_08_u:461: 'tha cando vayasā ca hyenāṃścandasā ca parigatyātmannadhattātmannakuruta
GV03sb_08_u:462: tathaivainānayametadvayasā caiva candasā ca parigatyātmandhatta ātmankurute
GV03sb_08_u:464: sa eṣa paśuryadagniḥ | so 'traiva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ saṃskṛtastasya yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:465: purastādupadadhāti śiro 'sya tā atha yā dakṣiṇataścottarataśca sa ātmātha yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:468: sa vai purastādevāgra upadadhāti | śiro hi prathamaṃ jāyamānasya jāyate 'tha
GV03sb_08_u:469: dakṣiṇata upadhāyottarata upadadhāti sārdhamayamātmā jāyātā ityatha paścātpucaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:472: tadyāni varṣiṣṭhāni candāṃsi | ye sthaviṣṭhāḥ paśavastānmadhya upadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:473: madhyaṃ tatprati paśuṃ variṣṭhaṃ karoti tasmānmadhyam prati paśurvariṣṭho 'tha
GV03sb_08_u:474: ye vīryavattamāḥ paśavastāndakṣiṇata upadadhāti dakṣiṇaṃ tadardham
GV03sb_08_u:477: pūrvārdhaṃ ca jaghanārdhaṃ cāṇiṣṭhau karoti | yadahāmūścatasrastenainā aṇiṣṭhā
GV03sb_08_u:478: atha yadiha hrasiṣṭhānpaśūnupadadhāti teno etā aṇiṣṭhāḥ pūrvārdhaṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:479: tajjaghanārdhaṃ ca paśoraṇiṣṭhau karoti tasmātpūrvārdhaśca jaghanārdhaśca
GV03sb_08_u:480: paśoraṇiṣṭhau tasmātpūrvārdhena ca jaghanārdhena ca paśurucca tiṣṭhati saṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:481: viśatyatha lokampṛṇe upadadhātyasyāṃ sraktyāṃ tayorupari bandhuḥ purīṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:484: tṛtīyāṃ citimupadadhāti | etadvai devā dvitīyāṃ citiṃ citvā samārohanyadūrdhvam
GV03sb_08_u:487: te 'bruvan | cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti te
GV03sb_08_u:488: cetayamānā antarikṣameva bṛhatīṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimapaśyaṃstebhya eṣa loko 'candayat
GV03sb_08_u:490: ta indrāgnī abruvan | yuvaṃ na imāṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimupadhattamiti kiṃ nau tato
GV03sb_08_u:491: bhaviṣyatīti yuvameva naḥ śreṣṭhau bhaviṣyatha iti tatheti tebhya etāmindrāgnī
GV03sb_08_u:492: tṛtīyāṃ citimupādhattāṃ tasmādāhurindrāgnī eva devānāṃ śreṣṭhāviti
GV03sb_08_u:494: sa vā indrāgnibhyāmupadadhāti | viśvakarmaṇā sādayatīndrāgnī ca vai viśvakarmā
GV03sb_08_u:497: yadvevendrāgnibhyāmupadadhāti | viśvakarmaṇā sādayati prajāpatiṃ visrastaṃ devatā
GV03sb_08_u:498: ādāya vyudakrāmaṃstasyendrāgnī ca viśvakarmā ca madhyamādāyotkamyātiṣṭhan
GV03sb_08_u:500: tānabravīt | upa meta prati ma etaddhatta yena me yūyamudakramiṣṭeti kiṃ nastato
GV03sb_08_u:501: bhaviṣyatīti yuṣmaddevatyameva ma etadātmano bhaviṣyatīti tatheti
GV03sb_08_u:507: indrāgnī avyathamānām | iṣṭakāṃ dṛṃhataṃ yuvamiti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:508: pṛṣṭhena dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ ca vibādhasa iti pṛṣṭhena hyeṣā dyāvāpṛthivī
GV03sb_08_u:511: viśvakarmā tvā sādayatviti | viśvakarmā hyetāṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimapaśyadantarikṣasya
GV03sb_08_u:516: viśvasmai prāṇāyāpānāya | vyānāyodānāyeti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇā sarvasmā u vā
GV03sb_08_u:517: etasmai prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāyai caritrāyetīme vai lokāḥ svayamātṛṇā ima u lokāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:519: mahatyā svastyetyetaccardiṣā śaṃtameneti yaccardiḥ śaṃtamaṃ tenetyetatsādayitvā
GV03sb_08_u:520: sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuratha sāma gāyati tasyopari bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:522: atha diśyā upadadhāti | diśo vai diśyā diśa evaitadupadadhāti tadyābhirado
GV03sb_08_u:523: vāyurdigbhiranantarhitābhirupaittā etāstā evaitadupadadhāti tā u evāmūḥ
GV03sb_08_u:524: purastāddarbhastambaṃ ca logeṣṭakāścopadadhātyasau vā āditya etā amuṃ tadādityaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:525: dikṣvadhyūhati dikṣu cinoti tā yattatraiva syurbahirdhā tatsyurbahirdho vā
GV03sb_08_u:526: etadyoneragnikarma yatpurā puṣkaraparṇāttā yadihāhṛtyopadadhāti tadenā yonau
GV03sb_08_u:527: puṣkaraparṇe pratiṣṭhāpayati tatho haitā abahirdhā bhavanti tā anantarhitāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:530: dadhāti retaḥsicorvelayeme vai retaḥsicāvanayostaddiśo dadhāti tasmādanayordiśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:531: sarvata upadadhāti sarvatastaddiśo dadhāti tasmātsarvato diśaḥ samīcīḥ
GV03sb_08_u:534: yadveva diśyā upadadhāti | candāṃsi vai diśo gāyatrī vai prācī diktraṣṭubdakṣiṇā
GV03sb_08_u:535: jagatī pratīcyanuṣṭubudīcī paṅktirūrdhvā paśavo vai candāṃsyantarikṣam
GV03sb_08_u:538: yadveva diśyā upadadhāti | candāṃsi vai diśaḥ paśavo vai candāṃsyannam paśavo
GV03sb_08_u:539: madhyam madhyamā citirmadhyatastadannaṃ dadhāti tā anantarhitāḥ svayamātṛṇāyā
GV03sb_08_u:540: upadadhāti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇānantarhitaṃ tatprāṇādannaṃ dadhātyuttarā uttaraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:541: tatprāṇādannaṃ dadhāti retaḥsicorvelayā pṛṣṭayo vai retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo
GV03sb_08_u:542: madhyata evāsminnetadannaṃ dadhāti sarvata upadadhāti sarvata evāsminnatadannaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:545: rāñyasi prācī dik | virāḍasi dakṣiṇā dikṣamrāḍasi pratīcī dikṣvarāḍasyudīcī
GV03sb_08_u:546: digadhipatnyasi bṛhatī digiti nāmānyāsāmetāni nāmagrāhamevainā etadupadadhāti tā
GV03sb_08_u:547: nānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasādhivadati nānā hi diśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:551: tāmanantarhitāṃ diśyābhya upadadhāti dikṣu tadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu
GV03sb_08_u:554: yadveva viśvajyotiṣamupadadhāti | prajā vai viśvajyotiḥ prajā hyeva viśvaṃ jyotiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:555: prajananamevaitadupadadhāti tāmanantarhitāṃ diśyābhyā upadadhāti dikṣu tatprajā
GV03sb_08_u:558: viśvakarmā tvā sādayatviti | viśvakarmā hyetāṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimapaśyadantarikṣasya
GV03sb_08_u:561: viśvasmai prāṇāyāpānāya | vyānāyeti prāṇo vai viśvajyotiḥ sarvasmā u vā etasmai
GV03sb_08_u:563: viśvaṃ jyotiryaceti sarvaṃ jyotiryacetyetadvāyuṣṭe 'dhipatiriti vāyumavāsyā adhipatiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:566: atha 'rtavyā upadadhāti | ṛtava ete yadṛtavyā ṛtūnevaitadupadadhāti nabhaśca
GV03sb_08_u:567: nabhasyaśca vārṣikāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine etadupadadhāti dve
GV03sb_08_u:568: iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ
GV03sb_08_u:572: athottare | iṣaścorjaśca śāradāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine
GV03sb_08_u:573: etadupadadhāti dve iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ
GV03sb_08_u:578: tadyadetā | atropadadhāti saṃvatsara eṣo 'gnirima u lokāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:583: yadvevaitā atropadadhāti | prajāpatireṣo 'gniḥ saṃvatsara u prajāpatistasya
GV03sb_08_u:584: madhyameva madhyamā citirmadhyamasya varṣāśaradāvṛtū tadyadetā atropadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:587: tā vā etāḥ | catasra ṛtavyā madhyamāyāṃ citā upadadhāti dve-dve itarāsu citiṣu
GV03sb_08_u:588: catuṣpādā vai paśavo 'ntarikṣam madhyamā citirantarikṣe tatpaśūndadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:591: yadveva catasraḥ catuṣpādā vai paśavo 'nnam paśavo madhyam madhyamā
GV03sb_08_u:594: yadveva catasraḥ | caturakṣaraṃ vā antarikṣaṃ dvyakṣarā
GV03sb_08_u:597: yadveva catasraḥ | paśureṣa yadagnirmadhyaṃ tatprati paśuṃ variṣṭhaṃ karoti
GV03sb_08_u:600: tā vā etāḥ | catasra ṛtavyāstāsāṃ viśvajyotiḥ pañcamī pañca diśyāstaddaśa daśākṣarā
GV03sb_08_u:601: virāḍannaṃ virāṇmadhyam madhyamā citirmadhyatastadannaṃ dadhāti tā
GV03sb_08_u:602: anantarhitāḥ svayamātṛṇāyā upadadhāti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇānantarhitaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:605: atha prāṇabhṛta upadadhāti | prāṇā vai prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇānevaitadupadadhāti tā daśa
GV03sb_08_u:606: bhavanti daśa vai prāṇāḥ pūrvārdha upadadhāti purastāddhīme prāṇā āyurme pāhi
GV03sb_08_u:607: jyotirme yaceti prāṇo vai jyotiḥ prāṇam me yacetyevaitadāha tā anantarhitā ṛtavyābhya
GV03sb_08_u:608: upadadhāti prāṇo vai vāyurṛtuṣu tadvāyum pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV03sb_08_u:610: atha candasyā upadadhāti | paśavo vai candāṃsyantarikṣam madhyamā citirantarikṣe
GV03sb_08_u:613: yadveva candasyā upadadhāti | paśavo vai candāṃsyannm paśavo madhyam
GV03sb_08_u:616: tā dvādaśa-dvādaśopadadhāti | dvādaśākṣarā vai jagatī paśavo jagatyantarikṣam
GV03sb_08_u:619: yadveva dvādaśa-dvādaśa | dvādaśākṣarā vai jagatī paśavo vai jagatyannam paśavo
GV03sb_08_u:620: madhyam madhyamā citirmadhyatastadanna dadhāti tā anantarhitāḥ prāṇabhṛdbhya
GV03sb_08_u:624: mā canda iti | ayaṃ vai loko māyaṃ hi loko mita iva pramā canda ityantarikṣaloko
GV03sb_08_u:625: vai pramāntarikṣaloko hyasmāllokātpramita iva pratimā canda ityasau vai lokaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:627: lokeṣvannaṃ tadasrīvayo 'tho yadebhyo lokebhyo 'nnaṃ sravati tadasrīvayo 'thāto
GV03sb_08_u:630: paṅktiścandaḥ | uṣṇikcando bṛhatī cando 'nuṣṭupcando virāṭ cando gāyatrī
GV03sb_08_u:631: candastriṣṭupcando jagatī canda ityetāni niruktāni virāḍaṣṭamāni
GV03sb_08_u:632: candāṃsyupadadhāti pṛthivī cando 'ntarikṣaṃ canda iti yānyetaddevatyāni candāṃsi
GV03sb_08_u:636: sa vai niruktāni cāniruktāni copadadhāti | sa yatsarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:639: niruktāni cāniruktāni copadadhāti tasmānniruktamannamadyamānaṃ na kṣīyate
GV03sb_08_u:641: tāni vā etāni | trīṇi dvādaśānyupadadhāti tatṣaṭtriṃśatṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarā bṛhatyeṣā
GV03sb_08_u:642: vai sā bṛhatī yāṃ taddevā antarikṣam bṛhatīṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimapaśyaṃstasyā etasyai devā
GV03sb_08_u:645: yadvevaitā iṣṭakā upadadhāti | prajāpatervisrastātsarvāṇi bhūtāni sarvā diśo 'nu
GV03sb_08_u:648: sa yaḥ sa prajāpatirvyasraṃsata | ayameva sa yo 'yamagniścīyate 'tha yānyasmāttāni
GV03sb_08_u:649: bhūtāni vyudakrāmannetāstā iṣṭakāstadyadetā upadadhāti yānyevāsmāttāni bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:652: tadyā daśa prathamā upadadhāti | sa candramāstā daśa bhavanti daśākṣarā
GV03sb_08_u:653: virāḍannaṃ virāḍannamu candramā atha yā uttarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadardhamāsāśca te
GV03sb_08_u:654: māsāśca caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dvādaśa māsāścandramā vai saṃvatsaraḥ sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:657: taṃ yatra devāḥ samaskurvan | tadasminnetāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni madhyato
GV03sb_08_u:661: atha vālakhilyā upadadhāti | prāṇā vai vālakhilyāḥ prāṇānevaitadupadadhāti tā
GV03sb_08_u:662: yadvālakhilyā nāma yadvā urvarayorasambhinnam bhavati khila iti vai tadācakṣate
GV03sb_08_u:665: sa vai sapta purastādupadadhāti | sapta paścāttadyāḥ sapta purastādupadadhāti ya
GV03sb_08_u:671: yadveva sapta purastādupadadhāti | sapta vā ime purastātprāṇāścatvāri dorbāhavāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:672: śiro grīvā yadūrdhvaṃ nābhestatsaptamamaṅge 'ṅge hi prāṇa ete vai sapta
GV03sb_08_u:675: atha yāḥ sapta paścāt | sapta vā ime paścātprāṇāścatvāryūrvaṣṭhīvāni dvai pratiṣṭhe
GV03sb_08_u:676: yadavāṅnābhestatsaptamamaṅge 'ṅge hi prāṇa ete vai sapta
GV03sb_08_u:679: mūrdhāsi rāṭ | dhruvāsi dharuṇā dhartryasi dharaṇī yantrī rāḍyantryasi yamanī
GV03sb_08_u:686: mūrdhāsi rāḍitīmaṃ lokamarohan | dhruvāsi dharuṇetyantarikṣalokaṃ dhartryasi
GV03sb_08_u:687: dharaṇītyamuṃ dharaṇītyamuṃ lokamāyuṣe tvā varcase tvā kṛṣyai tvā kṣemāya
GV03sb_08_u:692: sa sa parāṅiva rohaḥ | iyamu vai pratiṣṭhā te devā imām
GV03sb_08_u:695: yantri rāḍityamuṃ lokamarohan | yantryasi yamanītyantarikṣalokaṃ dhruvāsi
GV03sb_08_u:696: dharitrītīmaṃ lokamiṣe tvorje tvā rayyai tvā poṣāya tveti catvāraścatuṣpādāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:701: athātaḥ saṃskṛtireva | yā amūrekādaśeṣṭakā upadadhāti yo 'sau prathamo
GV03sb_08_u:702: 'nuvākastadantarikṣaṃ sa ātmā tadyattā ekādaśa bhavantyekādaśākṣarā vai
GV03sb_08_u:703: triṣṭuptraiṣṭubhamantarikṣamatha yā uttarāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ sa vāyuḥ sa prajāpatiḥ so 'gniḥ
GV03sb_08_u:706: tadyāḥ purastādupadadhāti | śiro 'sya tāstā daśa bhavanti daśa vai prāṇāḥ prāṇā u vai
GV03sb_08_u:709: atha yā dakṣiṇataḥ | yadūrdhvam madhyādavācīnaṃ śīrṣṇastadasya tā atha yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:710: paścādyadūrdhvam pratiṣṭhāyā avācīnam madhyāttadasya tāḥ pratiṣṭhaivottarataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:712: tadyāḥ sapta purastādvālakhilyā upadadhāti | ya eveme sapta
GV03sb_08_u:716: atha yāḥ sapta paścāt | ya eveme sapta paścātprāṇāstānasminnetaddadhāti tā
GV03sb_08_u:718: sa eṣa vāyuḥ prajāpatirasmiṃstraiṣṭubhe 'ntarikṣe samantam paryaknastadyattṛtīyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:719: citimupadadhāti vāyuṃ caiva tadantarikṣaṃ ca saṃkkṛtyopadhatte 'tha lokampṛṇe
GV03sb_08_u:720: upadadhātyasyāṃ sraktyāṃ tayorupari bandhuḥ purīṣaṃ nivapati tasyopari bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:722: caturthīṃ citimupadadhāti | etadvai devāstṛtīyāṃ citiṃ citvā samārohannantarikṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:725: te 'bruvan | cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti te
GV03sb_08_u:729: te brahmābruvan | tvāmihopadadhāmahā iti kim me tato bhaviṣyatīti tvameva naḥ
GV03sb_08_u:730: śreṣṭham bhaviṣyasīti tatheti te 'tra brahmopādadhata tasmādāhurbrahmaiva
GV03sb_08_u:731: devānāṃ śreṣṭhamiti tadetayā vai caturthyā cityeme dyāvāpṛthivī viṣṭabdhe brahma
GV03sb_08_u:732: vai caturthī citistasmādāhurbrahmaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī viṣṭabdhe iti stomānupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:733: prāṇā vai stomāḥ prāṇā u vai brahma brahmaivaitadupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:736: iti tatheti sa vai nābravītkim me tato bhaviṣyatīti yadu ha kiṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:738: putreṣvicate kimasmākaṃ tato bhaviṣyatītyevāhuratha yatputrāḥ pitari
GV03sb_08_u:739: tathetyevāhaivaṃ hi tadagre prajāpatiśca devāśca samavadanta stomānupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:740: prāṇā vai stomāḥ prāṇā u vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatimevaitadupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:742: yadveva stomānupadadhāti | ye vai te prāṇā ṛṣaya etāṃ caturthīṃ citimapaśyanye ta
GV03sb_08_u:743: etena rasenopāyaṃsta ete tānevaitadupadadhāti stomānupadadhāti prāṇā vai stomāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:746: yadveva stomānupadadhāti | prajāpatiṃ visrastaṃ devatā ādāya vyudakrāmaṃstasya
GV03sb_08_u:750: tamabravīt | upa mehi prati ma etaddhehi yena me tvamudakramīriti kim me tato
GV03sb_08_u:751: bhaviṣyatīti tvaddevatyameva ma etadātmano bhaviṣyatīti tatheti
GV03sb_08_u:754: tadyā etā aṣṭādaśa prathamāḥ | etadasya tadātmanastadyadetā atropadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:756: stomānupadadhāti prāṇā vai stomāḥ prāṇāu vai vāyurvāyumevaitadupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:758: sa purastādupadadhāti | āśustrivṛditi ya eva trivṛtstomastaṃ tadupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:759: tadyattamāhāśurityeṣa hi stomānāmāśiṣṭho 'tho vāyurvā āśustrivṛtsa eṣu triṣu
GV03sb_08_u:760: lokeṣu vartate tadyattamāhāśurityeṣa hi sarveṣām bhūtānāmāśiṣṭho vāyurha bhūtvā
GV03sb_08_u:763: bhāntaḥ pañcadaśa iti | ya eva pañcadaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:764: bhānta iti vajro vai bhānto vajraḥ pañcadaśo 'tho candramā vai bhāntaḥ pañcadaśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:765: sa ca pañcadaśāhānyāpūryate pañcadaśāpakṣīyate tadyattamāha bhānta iti bhāti hi
GV03sb_08_u:766: candramāścandramā ha bhūtvā dakṣiṇatastasthau tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:768: vyomā saptadaśa iti | ya eva saptadaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:769: vyometi prajāpatirvai vyomā prajāpatiḥ saptadaśo 'tho saṃvatsaro vāva vyomā
GV03sb_08_u:770: saptadaśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavastadyattamāha vyometi vyomā hi
GV03sb_08_u:771: saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro ha bhūtvottaratastasthau tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:773: dharuṇa ekaviṃśa iti | ya evaikaviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha dharuṇa
GV03sb_08_u:774: iti pratiṣṭhā vai dharuṇaḥ pratiṣṭhaikaviṃśo 'tho asau vā ādityo dharuṇa
GV03sb_08_u:775: ekaviṃśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavastraya ime lokā asāvevādityo dharuṇa
GV03sb_08_u:776: ekaviṃśastadyattamāha dharuṇa iti yadā hyevaiṣo 'stametyathedaṃ sarvaṃ dhriyata
GV03sb_08_u:777: ādityo ha bhūtvā paścāttasthau tadeva tadrūpamupadadhātyatha
GV03sb_08_u:780: pratūrtiraṣṭādaśa iti | ya evāṣṭādaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:781: pratūrtiraṣṭādaśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsara eva
GV03sb_08_u:782: pratūrtiraṣṭādaśastadyattamāha pratūrtiriti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni pratirati
GV03sb_08_u:785: tapo navadaśa iti | ya eva navadaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro tapo
GV03sb_08_u:786: navadaśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ ṣaḍṛtavaḥ saṃvatsara eva tapo navadaśastadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:787: tapa iti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni tapati tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:789: abhīvartaḥ saviṃśa iti | ya eva saviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vā
GV03sb_08_u:790: abhīvartaḥ saviṃśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ sapta 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsara evābhīvartaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:791: saviṃśastadyattamāhābhīvarta iti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtānyabhivartate tadeva
GV03sb_08_u:794: varco dvāviṃśa iti | ya eva dvāviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:795: varco dvāviṃśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ sapta 'rtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara eva varco
GV03sb_08_u:796: dvāviṃśastadyattamāha varca iti saṃvatsaro hi sarveṣām bhūtānāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:799: sambharaṇastrayoviṃśa iti ya eva trayoviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_08_u:800: vāva sambharaṇastrayoviṃsastasya trayodaśa māsā sapta 'rtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara
GV03sb_08_u:801: eva sambharaṇastrayoviṃśastadyattamāha sambharaṇa iti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:804: yoniścaturviṃśa iti | ya eva caturviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:808: garbhāḥ pañcaviṃśa iti | ya eva pañcaviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_08_u:809: vāva garbhāḥ pañcaviṃśastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsāḥ saṃvatsara eva garbhāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:810: pañcaviṃśastadyattamāha garbhā iti saṃvatsaro ha trayodaśo māso garbho bhūtva
GV03sb_08_u:813: ojastriṇava iti | ya eva triṇava stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāhauja iti v!jro vā
GV03sb_08_u:814: ojo vajrastriṇavo 'tho saṃvatsaro vā ojastriṇavastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dve
GV03sb_08_u:815: ahorātre saṃvatsara evaujastriṇavastadyattamāhauja iti saṃvatsaro hi sarveṣām
GV03sb_08_u:818: kraturekatriṃśa iti | ya evaikatriṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:820: kraturekatriṃśastadyattamāha kraturiti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni karoti tadeva
GV03sb_08_u:823: pratiṣṭhā trayastriṃśa iti | ya eva trayastriṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:824: pratiṣṭheti pratiṣṭhā hi trayastriṃśo 'tho saṃvatsaro vāva pratiṣṭhā trayastriṃśastasya
GV03sb_08_u:825: caturviṃśatirardhamāsāḥ ṣadṛtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara eva pratiṣṭhā
GV03sb_08_u:826: trayastriṃśastadyattamāha pratiṣṭheti saṃvatsaro hi sarveṣām bhūtānām pratiṣṭhā
GV03sb_08_u:829: bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ catustriṃśa iti | ya eta catustriṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho
GV03sb_08_u:830: saṃvatsaro vāva bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ catustriṃśastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsāḥ sapta
GV03sb_08_u:831: 'rtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara eva bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ catustriṃśastadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:832: bradhnasya viṣṭapamiti svārājyaṃ vai bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ svārājya
GV03sb_08_u:835: nākaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśa iti | ya eva ṣaṭtriṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:836: nākaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dvādaśa māsāstadyattamāha nāka iti na
GV03sb_08_u:837: hi tatra gatāya kasmai canākam bhavatyatho saṃvatsaro vāva nākaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_08_u:840: vivarto 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśa iti | ya evāṣṭācatvariṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho
GV03sb_08_u:842: sapta 'rtavo dve ahorātre tadyattamāha vivarta iti saṃvatsarāddhi sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:845: dhartraṃ catuṣṭoma iti | ya eva catuṣṭoma stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:846: dhartramiti pratiṣṭhā vai dhartram pratiṣṭhā catuṣṭomo 'tho vāyurvāva dhartraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:847: catuṣṭomaḥ sa ābhiścatasṛbhirdigbhi stute tadyattamāha dhartramiti pratiṣṭhā vai
GV03sb_08_u:848: dhartraṃ vāyuru sarveṣām bhūtānām pratiṣṭhā tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti sa vai
GV03sb_08_u:849: vāyumeva prathamamupadadhāti vāyumuttamaṃ vāyunaiva tadetāni sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:852: tā vā etāḥ | aṣṭādaśeṣṭakā upadadhāti tau dvau trivṛtau prāṇo vai trivṛdvāyuru prāṇo
GV03sb_08_u:855: yadvevāṣṭādaśa | aṣṭādaśo vai saṃvatsaro dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsara
GV03sb_08_u:859: atha spṛta upadadhāti | etadvai prajāpatiretasminnātmanaḥ pratihite sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:860: garbhyabhavattānyasya garbha eva santi pāpmā mṛtyuragṛhṇāt
GV03sb_08_u:862: sa devānabravīt | yuṣmābhiḥ sahemāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni pāpmano mṛtyo spṛṇavānīti
GV03sb_08_u:863: kiṃ nastato bhaviṣyatīti vṛṇīdhvamityabravīttam bhāgo no 'stvityeke
GV03sb_08_u:866: bhāgamekebhyaḥ kṛtvādhipatyamekebhyaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni pāpmano mṛtyo spṛṇoti
GV03sb_08_u:869: agnirbhāgo 'si | dīkṣāyā ādhipatyamiti vāgvai dīkṣāgnaye bhāgaṃ kṛtvā vāca
GV03sb_08_u:870: ādhipatyamakarodbrahma spṛtaṃ trivṛtstoma iti brahma prajānāṃ trivṛtā stomena
GV03sb_08_u:873: indrasya bhāgo 'si | viṣṇorādhipatyamitīndrāya bhāgaṃ kṛtvā viṣṇava
GV03sb_08_u:874: ādhipatyamakarotkṣatraṃ spṛtam pañcadaśa stoma iti kṣatram prajānām
GV03sb_08_u:877: nṛcakṣasām bhāgo 'si | dhāturādhipatyamiti devā vai nṛcakṣaso devebhyo bhāgaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:878: kṛtvā dhātra ādhipatyamakarojjanitraṃ spṛtaṃ saptadaśa stoma iti viḍvai janitraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:879: viśam prajānāṃ saptadaśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇot
GV03sb_08_u:881: mitrasya bhāgo 'si | varuṇasyādhipatyamiti prāṇo vai mitro 'pāno varuṇaḥ prāṇāya
GV03sb_08_u:882: bhāgaṃ kṛtvāpānāyādhipatyamakaroddivo vṛṣṭirvāta spṛta ekaviṃśa stoma iti vṛṣṭiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:883: ca vātaṃ ca prajānāmekaviṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇot
GV03sb_08_u:885: vasūnām bhāgo 'si | rudrāṇāmādhipatyamiti prāṇo vai mitro 'pāno varuṇaḥ prāṇāya
GV03sb_08_u:886: bhāgaṃ kṛtvāpānāyādhipatyamakaroddivo vṛṣṭirvāta spṛta ekaviṃśa stoma iti vṛṣṭiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:887: ca vātaṃ ca prajānāmekaviṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇot
GV03sb_08_u:889: ādityānām bhāgo 'si | marutāmādhipatyamityādityebhyo bhāgaṃ kṛtvā marudbhya
GV03sb_08_u:890: ādhipatyamakarodgarbhā spṛtāḥ pañcaviṃśa stoma iti garbhānprajānām pañcaviṃśena
GV03sb_08_u:893: adityai bhāgo 'si | pūṣṇaṃ ādhipatyamitīyaṃ vā aditirasyai bhāgaṃ kṛtvā pūṣṇa
GV03sb_08_u:894: ādhipatyamakarodoja spṛtaṃ triṇava stoma ityojaḥ prajānāṃ triṇavena stomena
GV03sb_08_u:897: devasya saviturbhāgo 'si | bṛhaspaterādhipatyamiti devāya savitre bhāgaṃ kṛtvā
GV03sb_08_u:898: bṛhaspataya ādhipatyamakarotsamīcīrdiśa spṛtāścatuṣṭoma stoma iti sarvā diśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:901: yavānām bhāgo 'si | ayavānāmādhipatyamiti pūrvapakṣā vai yavā aparapakṣā
GV03sb_08_u:902: ayavāste hīdaṃ sarvaṃ yuvate cāyuvate ca pūrvapakṣebhyo bhāgaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:903: kṛtvāparapakṣebhya ādhipatyamakarotprajā spṛtāścatuścatvāriṃśa stoma iti sarvāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:906: ṛbhūṇām bhāgo 'si | viṣveṣāṃ devānāmādhipatyamityṛbhubhyo bhāgaṃ kṛtvā
GV03sb_08_u:907: viśvebhyo devebhya ādhipatyamakarodbhūtaṃ spṛtaṃ trayastriṃśa stoma iti sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:908: bhūtāni trayastriṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇottathaivaitadyajamānaḥ sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:909: bhūtāni trayastriṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyo spṛṇoti
GV03sb_08_u:911: tā vā etā daśeṣṭakā upadadhāti | daśākṣarā virāḍvirāḍagnirdaśa diśo diśo 'gnirdaśa
GV03sb_08_u:912: prāṇāḥ prāṇā agniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataiva tadetāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:915: atha 'rtavye upadadhāti | ṛtava ete yadṛtavye ṛtūnevaitadupadadhāti sahaśca
GV03sb_08_u:916: sahasyaśca haimantikāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine etadupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:917: dve iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ karoti
GV03sb_08_u:919: tadyadete atropadadhāti | saṃvatsara eṣo 'gnirima u lokāḥ saṃvatsarastasya
GV03sb_08_u:924: yadvevaite atropadadhāti | prajāpatireṣo 'gniḥ saṃvatsara u prajāpatistasya
GV03sb_08_u:925: yadūrdhvam madhyādavācīnaṃ śīrṣṇastadasyaiṣā caturthī citistadvasya hemanta
GV03sb_08_u:929: atha sṛṣṭīrupadadhāti | etadvai prajāpatiḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni pāpmano
GV03sb_08_u:932: sa prāṇānabravīt | yuṣmābhiḥ sahemāḥ prajāḥ prajanayānīti te vai kena stoṣyāmaha
GV03sb_08_u:933: iti mayā caiva yuṣmābhiśceti tatheti te prāṇaiścaiva prajāpatinā cāstuvata yadu ha kiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:934: ca devāḥ kurvate stomenaiva tatkurvate yajño vai stomo yajñenaiva tatkurvate
GV03sb_08_u:937: ekayāstuvateti | vāgvā ekā vācaiva tadastuvata prajā adhīyanteti prajā atrādhīyanta
GV03sb_08_u:940: tisṛbhirastuvateti | trayo vai prāṇāḥ prāṇa udāno vyānastaireva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:944: pañcabhirastuvateti | ya eveme manaḥpañcamāḥ prāṇāstaireva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:948: saptabhirastuvateti | ya eveme sapta śīrṣanprāṇāstaireva tadastuvata sapta ṛṣayo
GV03sb_08_u:951: navabhirastuvateti | nava vai prāṇāḥ sapta śīrṣannavāñcau dvau taireva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:954: ekādaśabhirastuvateti | daśa prāṇā ātmaikādaśastenaiva tadastuvata ṛtavo
GV03sb_08_u:957: trayodaśabhirastuvateti | daśa prāṇā dve pratiṣṭhe ātmā trayodaśastenaiva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:958: māsā asṛjyanteti māsā atrāsṛjyanta saṃvatsaro 'dhipatirāsīditi saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_08_u:961: pañcadaśabhirastuvateti | daśa hastyā aṅgulayaścatvāri dorbāhavāṇi yadūrdhvaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:965: saptadaśabhirastuvateti | daśa pādyā aṅgulayaścatvāryūrvaṣṭhīvāni dve pratiṣṭhe
GV03sb_08_u:966: yadavāṅnābhestatsaptadaśaṃ tenaiva tadastuvata grāmyāḥ paśavo 'sṛjyanteti grāmyāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:969: navadaśabhirastuvateti | daśa hastyā aṅgulayo nava prāṇāstaireva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:973: ekaviṃśatyāstuvateti | daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā ātmaikaviṃśastenaiva
GV03sb_08_u:977: trayoviṃśatyāstuvateti | daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā dve pratiṣṭhe ātmā
GV03sb_08_u:978: trayoviṃśastenaiva tadastuvata kṣudrāḥ paśavo 'sṛjyanteti kṣudrāḥ paśavo
GV03sb_08_u:981: pañcaviṃśatyāstuvateti | daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyāścatvāryaṅgānyātmā
GV03sb_08_u:985: saptaviṃśatyāstuvateti | daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyāścatvāryaṅgāni dve pratiṣṭhe
GV03sb_08_u:986: ātmā saptaviṃśastenaiva tadastuvata dyāvāpṛthivī vyaitāmiti dyāvāpṛthivī atra vyaitāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:987: vasavo rudrā ādityā anuvyāyanniti vasavo rudrā ādityā atrānuvyāyaṃsta evādhipataya
GV03sb_08_u:990: navaviṃśatyāstuvateti | daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā nava prāṇāstaireva
GV03sb_08_u:994: ekatriṃśatāstuvateti | daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā daśa prāṇā
GV03sb_08_u:995: ātmaikatriṃśastenaiva tadastuvata prajā asṛjyanteti prajā atrāsṛjyanta
GV03sb_08_u:998: trayastriṃśatāstuvateti | daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā daśa prāṇā dve pratiṣṭhe
GV03sb_08_u:1003: tā vā etāḥ | saptadaśeṣṭakā upadadhāti saptadaśo vai saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ sa
GV03sb_08_u:1004: prajanayitā tadetena vai saptadaśena saṃvatsareṇa prajāpatinā prajanayitraitāḥ prajāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1007: prajāpatinā prajanayitraitāḥ prajāḥ prajanayati tāḥ sṛṣṭvātmanprapādayate
GV03sb_08_u:1008: retaḥsicorvelayā pṛṣṭayo vai retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyata evāsminnetāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1009: prajāḥ prapādayati sarvata upadadhāti sarvata evāsminnetāḥ prajāḥ prapādayati
GV03sb_08_u:1015: mṛtyurasīdadimāmata upadhāsyate tamatra grahīṣyāmīti tam prāpaśyattam
GV03sb_08_u:1023: pañcadaśavatyāṃ saptadaśavatīṃ saptadaśavatyām pañcadaśavatīṃ tā yadevaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1024: vyatihāramupadadhāti tasmādakṣṇayāstomīyā atho yadete stomā ato 'nyathānupūrvaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1025: tasmādvevākṣṇayāstomīyā atho evaṃ devā upādadhatetarathāsurāstato devā
GV03sb_08_u:1026: abhavanparāsurā bhavatyātmanā parāsya dviṣanbhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV03sb_08_u:1028: sa eṣa paśuryadagniḥ | so 'traiva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ saṃskṛtastasya trivṛdvatyāveva śiraste
GV03sb_08_u:1029: yattrivṛdvatyau bhavatastrivṛddhi śiro dve bhavato dvikapālaṃ hi śiraḥ pūrvārdha
GV03sb_08_u:1032: pratiṣṭhaikaviṃśavatyau | te yadekaviṃśavatyau bhavataḥ pratiṣṭhā hyekaviṃśo dve
GV03sb_08_u:1033: bhavato dvandvaṃ hi pratiṣṭhā paścādupadadhāti paścāddhīyam pratiṣṭhā
GV03sb_08_u:1035: bāhū pañcadaśavatyau | te yatpañcadaśavatyau bhavataḥ pañcadaśau hi bāhū dve
GV03sb_08_u:1036: bhavato dvau hīmau bāhū pārśvata upadadhāti pārśvato hīmau bāhū
GV03sb_08_u:1038: annaṃ saptadaśavatyau | te yatsaptadaśavatyau bhavataḥ saptadaśaṃ hyannaṃ dve
GV03sb_08_u:1044: atha yā madhya upadadhāti | sa ātmā tā retaḥsicorvelayopadadhāti pṛṣṭayo vai
GV03sb_08_u:1045: retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyato hyayamātmā sarvata upadadhāti sarvato
GV03sb_08_u:1046: hyayamātmātha yadato 'nyadatiriktaṃ tadyadvai devānāmatiriktaṃ candāṃsi tāni
GV03sb_08_u:1047: tadyāni tāni candāṃsi paśavaste tadye te paśavaḥ puṇyāstā lakṣmyastadyāstāḥ puṇyā
GV03sb_08_u:1048: lakṣmyo 'sau sa ādityaḥ sa āsāmeṣa dakṣiṇataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1050: tā haike 'nantarhitāstrivṛdvatībhyāmupadadhati | jihvāhanū iti vadanto yāścaturdaśa
GV03sb_08_u:1051: te hanū yāḥ ṣaṭ sā jihveti na tathā kuryādati te recayanti yathā pūrvayorhanvorapare
GV03sb_08_u:1055: asminnu haike 'vāntaradeśa upadadhati | asau vā āditya etā amuṃ tadādityametasyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1056: diśi dadhma iti na tathā kuryādanyāni vāva tāni karmāṇi yairetamatra dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1058: dakṣiṇata u haika upadadhati | tadetāḥ puṇyā lakṣmīrdakṣiṇato dadhmaha iti
GV03sb_08_u:1059: tasmādyasya dakṣiṇato lakṣma bhavati tam puṇyalakṣmīka ityācakṣata uttarata
GV03sb_08_u:1060: striyā uttarataāyatanā hi strī tattatkṛtameva purastāttvevainā upadadhyādyatrāhaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1061: śirastadeva hanū tajjihvāthaitāḥ puṇyā lakṣmīrmukhato dhatte tasmādyasya mukhe
GV03sb_08_u:1070: sraktyāṃ tayorupari bandhuḥ purīṣaṃ nivapati tasyopari bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1072: pañcamīṃ citimupadadhāti | etadvai devāścaturthīṃ citiṃ citvā
GV03sb_08_u:1075: te 'bruvan | cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti te
GV03sb_08_u:1076: cetayamānā divameva virājam pañcamīṃ citimapaśyaṃstebhya eṣa loko 'candayat
GV03sb_08_u:1079: tajjānīta yathemaṃ lokamasapatnamanupabādhaṃ karavāmahā iti te
GV03sb_08_u:1083: te cetayamānāḥ | etā iṣṭakā apaśyannasapatnāstā upādadhata tābhiretaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1087: sarvata evaitadetaṃ lokamasapatnamanupabādhaṃ kurute parārdha upadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1090: atha virāja upadadhāti | eṣā vai sā virāḍyāṃ taddevā virājam pañcamīṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1091: citimapaśyaṃstā daśa-daśopadadhāti daśākṣarā virāḍvirāḍeṣā civiḥ sarvata
GV03sb_08_u:1092: upadadhāti yo vā ekasyāṃ diśi virājati na vai sa virājati yo vāva sarvāsu dikṣu virājati
GV03sb_08_u:1095: yadvevaitā asapatnā upadadhāti | etadvai prajāpatimetasminnātmanaḥ pratihite
GV03sb_08_u:1096: sarvataḥ pāpmopāyatata sa etā iṣṭakā apaśyadasapatnāstā upādhatta tābhistam
GV03sb_08_u:1097: pāpmānamapāhata pāpmā vai sapatnastadyadetābhiḥ pāpmānaṃ sapatnamapāhata
GV03sb_08_u:1100: tadvā etatkriyate | yaddevā akurvannidaṃ nvimaṃ sa pāpmā nopayatate
GV03sb_08_u:1101: yattvetatkaroti yaddevā akurvaṃstatkaravāṇītyatho ya eva pāpmā yaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1103: asapatnāḥ sarvata upadadhāti sarvata evaitatpāpmānaṃ sapatnamapahate parārdha
GV03sb_08_u:1106: sa purastādupadadhāti | agne jātānpraṇudā naḥ sapatnāniti yathaiva yajustathā
GV03sb_08_u:1107: bandhuratha paścātsahasā jātānpraṇudā naḥ sapatnāniti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1109: sā yā purastādagniḥ sā | yā paścādagniḥ sāgninaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1113: atha dakṣiṇataḥ | ṣoḍaśī stoma ojo draviṇamityekādaśākṣarā vai
GV03sb_08_u:1114: triṣṭuptraiṣṭubhamantarikṣaṃ catasro diśa eṣa eva vajraḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1115: pañcadaśastasyāsāvevādityaḥ ṣoḍaśī vajrasya bhartā sa etena pañcadaśena
GV03sb_08_u:1116: vajreṇaitayā triṣṭubhā dakṣiṇataḥ pāpmānamapāhata tathaivaitadyajamāna etena
GV03sb_08_u:1119: athottarataḥ | catuścatvāriṃśa stomo varco draviṇamiti catuścatvāriṃśadakṣarā vai
GV03sb_08_u:1120: triṣṭuptraiṣṭubho vajraḥ sa etena catuścatvāriṃśena vajreṇaitayā triṣṭubhottarataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1124: atha madhye | agneḥ purīṣamasīti brahma vai caturthī citiragniru vai brahma tasyā
GV03sb_08_u:1127: tām prācīṃ tiraścīmupadadhāti | etaddhaitayā prajāpatiḥ pāpmano
GV03sb_08_u:1129: dakṣiṇataudyāmo hi vajro 'ntareṇa dakṣiṇāṃ diśyāmudyāmāya ha tamavakāśaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1132: sā yā purastātprāṇaḥ sā | yā paścādapānaḥ sā prāṇenaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1136: atha ye abhitaḥ | tau bāhū sa yo 'syābhitaḥ pāpmāsīdbāhubhyāṃ tamapāhata
GV03sb_08_u:1137: tathaivaitadyajamāno yo 'syābhitaḥ pāpmā bhavati bāhubhyāmeva tamapahate
GV03sb_08_u:1142: sa yaddha vā evaṃvitprāṇiti | yo 'sya purastātpāpmā bhavati taṃ tenāpahate 'tha
GV03sb_08_u:1143: yadapāniti tena taṃ yaḥ paścādatha yadbāhubhyāṃ karma kurute tena taṃ yo 'bhito
GV03sb_08_u:1144: 'tha yadannamatti tena taṃ ya upariṣṭātsarvadā ha vā evaṃvitpāpmānamapahate 'pi
GV03sb_08_u:1145: svapaṃstasmādevaṃ viduṣaḥ pāpaṃ na kīrtayennedasya pāpmāsānīti
GV03sb_08_u:1147: atha candasyā upadadhāti | etadvai prajāpatiḥ pāpmano
GV03sb_08_u:1150: prāyacannetāścandasyāḥ paśavo vai candāṃsyannam paśavastānyasmā acadayaṃstāni
GV03sb_08_u:1157: evaścanda iti | ayaṃ vai loka evaścando varivaścanda ityantarikṣaṃ vai varivaścandaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1158: śambhūścanda iti dyaurvai śambhūścandaḥ paribhūścanda iti diśo vai paribhūścanda
GV03sb_08_u:1159: ācaccanda ityannaṃ vā ācaccando manaścanda iti p rajāpatirvai manaścando
GV03sb_08_u:1162: sindhuścanda iti | prāṇo vai sindhuścandaḥ samudraścanda iti mano vai
GV03sb_08_u:1163: samudraścandaḥ sariraṃ canda iti vāgvai sariraṃ candaḥ kakupcanda iti prāṇo vai
GV03sb_08_u:1164: kakupcandastrikakupcanda ityudāno vai trikakupcandaḥ kāvyaṃ canda iti trayī vai
GV03sb_08_u:1165: vidyā kāvyaṃ cando 'ṅkupaṃ canda ityāpo vā aṅkupaṃ cando 'kṣarapaṅktiścanda
GV03sb_08_u:1166: ityasau vai loko 'kṣarapaṅktiścandaḥ padapaṅktiścanda ityayaṃ vai lokaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1167: padapaṅktiścando viṣṭārapaṅktiścanda iti diśo vai viṣṭārapaṅktiścandaḥ kṣuro
GV03sb_08_u:1168: bhrajaścanda ityasau vā ādityaḥ kṣuro bhrajaścanda ācaccandaḥ pracaccanda
GV03sb_08_u:1171: saṃyaccanda iti | rātrirvai saṃyaccando viyaccanda ityaharvai viyaccando bṛhaccanda
GV03sb_08_u:1172: ityasau vai loko bṛhaccando rathantaraṃ canda ityayaṃ vai loko rathantaraṃ cando
GV03sb_08_u:1173: nikāyaścanda iti vāyurvai nikāyaścando vivadhaścanda ityantarikṣaṃ vai
GV03sb_08_u:1174: vivadhaścando giraścanda ityannaṃ vai giraścando bhrajaścanda ityagnirvai
GV03sb_08_u:1176: vāganuṣṭupcanda evas=cando varivaścanda iti tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1178: vayaścanda iti | annaṃ vai vayaścando vayaskṛccanda ityagnirvai vayaskṛccando
GV03sb_08_u:1179: viṣpardhāścanda ityasau vai loko viṣpardhāścando viśālaṃ canda ityayaṃ vai loko
GV03sb_08_u:1180: viśālaṃ candaścadiścanda ityantarikṣaṃ vai cadiścando dūrohaṇaṃ canda ityasau vā
GV03sb_08_u:1181: ādityo dūrohaṇaṃ candastandraṃ canda iti paṅktirvai tandraṃ cando 'ṅkāṅkaṃ canda
GV03sb_08_u:1185: dvitīyodānastṛtīyodānaścaturthī vyānaḥ pañcamī prāṇaḥ ṣaṣṭhī prāṇaḥ saptamī
GV03sb_08_u:1186: vyāno 'ṣṭamyudāno navamī yajamāna evātra daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna etasyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1190: atha yā dakṣiṇato | 'gnistāsām prathamā vāyurdvitīyādityastṛtīyādityaścaturthī vāyuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1191: pañcamyagniḥ ṣaṣṭhyagniḥ saptamī vāyuraṣṭamyādityo navamī yajamāna evātra
GV03sb_08_u:1192: daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna etasyāṃ virājyadhūḍhaḥ pratiṣṭhito devatāmayyāmarvācīśca
GV03sb_08_u:1195: atha yāḥ paścāt | ayaṃ lokastāsām prathamāntarikṣaṃ dvitīyā dyaustṛtīyā
GV03sb_08_u:1197: saptamyantarikṣamaṣṭamī dyaurnavamī yajamāna evātra daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna
GV03sb_08_u:1201: atha yā uttarataḥ | grīṣmastāsām prathamā varṣā dvitīyā hemantastṛtīyā
GV03sb_08_u:1202: hemantaścaturthī varṣāḥ pañcamī grīṣmaḥ ṣaṣṭhī grīṣmaḥ saptamī varṣā
GV03sb_08_u:1203: aṣṭamī hemanto navamī yajamāna evātra daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna etasyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1204: virājyadhyūḍhaḥ pratiṣṭhita ṛtumayyāmarvācīśca parācīścopadadhāti tasmādeta ṛtavo
GV03sb_08_u:1207: atha punareva | yāḥ purastādupadadhāti prāṇāste tā daśa bhavanti daśa vai prāṇāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1210: atha yā dakṣiṇataḥ | etāstā devatā agniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca
GV03sb_08_u:1213: atha yāḥ paścāt | diśastāścatasro diśaścatasro 'vāntaradiśa ūrdhvā ceyaṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:1215: atha yā uttarataḥ | māsāste vāsantikau dvau graiṣmau dvau vārṣikau dvau śāradau
GV03sb_08_u:1218: atha punareva | yā prathamā daśadayaṃ sa loko yā dvitīyāntarikṣaṃ tadyā tṛtīyā
GV03sb_08_u:1219: dyauḥ semameva lokam prathamayā daśatārohannantarikṣaṃ dvitīyayā divaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1220: tṛtīyayā tathaivaitadyajamāna imameva lokam prathamayā daśatā rohatyantarikṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1223: sa sa parāṅiva rohaḥ | iyamu vai pratiṣṭhā te devā imām
GV03sb_08_u:1225: yottamā daśadayaṃ sa lokastasmādyathaiva prathamāyai daśataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1233: 'smādudacikramiṣattamabravītkathotkrāmasi kathā mā jahāsīti sa vai me 'syānnasya
GV03sb_08_u:1234: rasam prayaceti tena vai mā saha prapadyasveti tatheti tasmā etasyānnasya rasam
GV03sb_08_u:1237: sa yaḥ sa prajāpatiḥ | ayameva sa yo 'yamagniścīyate 'tha yattadannametāstāścandasyā
GV03sb_08_u:1238: atha yaḥ so 'nnasya rasa etāstā stomabhāgā atha yaḥ sa indro 'sau sa ādityaḥ sa eṣa
GV03sb_08_u:1239: eva stomo yaddhi kiṃ ca stuvata etameva tena stuvanti tasmā etasmai stomāyaitam
GV03sb_08_u:1242: raśminā satyāya satyaṃ jinveti | eṣa vai raśmirannaṃ raśmiretaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:1243: saṃdhāyātmanprapādayate pretinā dharmaṇā dharmaṃ jinvetyeṣa vai pretirannam
GV03sb_08_u:1244: pretiretaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca saṃdhāyātmanprapādayate 'nvityā divā divaṃ jinvetyeṣa vā
GV03sb_08_u:1245: anvitirannamanvitiretaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca saṃdhāyātmanprapādayate tadyadyadetadāha
GV03sb_08_u:1249: yadveva stomabhāgā upadadhāti | etadvai devā virājaṃ citiṃ citvā samārohaṃste
GV03sb_08_u:1251: svargaṃ lokamapaśyaṃstamupādadhata sa yaḥ sa nākaḥ svargo loka etāstā
GV03sb_08_u:1254: tadyāstisraḥ prathamāḥ | ayaṃ sa loko yā dvitīyā antarikṣaṃ tadyāstṛtīyā dyauḥ sā
GV03sb_08_u:1255: yāścaturthyaḥ prācī sā digyāḥ pañcamyo dakṣiṇā sā yāḥ ṣaṣṭhyaḥ pratīcī sā yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1258: tā vā etāḥ | ekaviṃśatiriṣṭakā ime ca lokā diśaśceme ca vai lokā diśaśca pratiṣṭheme
GV03sb_08_u:1261: atha yā aṣṭāviṣṭakā atiyanti | sāṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī brahma gāyatrī
GV03sb_08_u:1265: taddhaike | veṣaśrīḥ kṣatrāya kṣatraṃ jinveti triṃśattamīmupadadhati
GV03sb_08_u:1266: triṃśadakṣarā virāḍvirāḍeṣā citiriti na tathā kuryādati te
GV03sb_08_u:1268: virāḍindrāya ha ta indraloke dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam pratyudyāminaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1269: kurvantīndramindralokānnudante yajamāno vai sve yajña indro yajamānāya ha te
GV03sb_08_u:1270: yajamānaloke dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam pratyudyāminaṃ kurvanti yajamānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1271: yajamānalokānnudante yaṃ vā etamagnimāharantyeṣa eva yajamāna āyatanenaiṣa u
GV03sb_08_u:1274: tā aṣāḍhāyai velayopadadhāti | vāgvā aṣāḍhā rasa eṣa vāci tadrasaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1277: yadvevāṣāḍhāyai | iyaṃ vā aṣāḍhāsāvāditya stomabhāgā amuṃ tadādityamasyām
GV03sb_08_u:1280: yadvevāṣāḍhāyai | iyaṃ vā aṣāḍhā hṛdayaṃ stomabhāgā asyāṃ taddhṛdayam mano
GV03sb_08_u:1281: dadhāti tasmādasyāṃ hṛdayena manasā cetayate sarvata upadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1282: sarvatastaddhṛdayam mano dadhāti tasmādasyāṃ sarvato hṛdayena manasā cetayate
GV03sb_08_u:1283: 'tho puṇyā haitā lakṣmyastā etatsarvato dhatte tasmādyasya sarvato lakṣma bhavati
GV03sb_08_u:1286: athaināḥ purīṣeṇa pracādayati | annaṃ vai purīṣaṃ rasa eṣa tametattiraḥ karoti
GV03sb_08_u:1289: yadveva purīṣeṇa | annaṃ vai purīṣaṃ rasa eṣo 'nnaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca saṃtanoti
GV03sb_08_u:1292: yadveva purīṣeṇa | hṛdayaṃ vai stomabhāgāḥ purītatpurīṣaṃ hṛdayaṃ tatpurītatā
GV03sb_08_u:1296: tadyāścatasraḥ prathamāścitayaste catvāra ṛtavo 'tha stomabhāgā upadhāya purīṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1297: nivapati sā pañcamī citiḥ sa pañcama ṛtuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1299: tadāhuḥ | yallokampṛṇāntā anyāścitayo bhavanti nātra lokampṛṇāmupadadhāti kātra
GV03sb_08_u:1300: lokampṛṇetyasau vā ādityo lokampṛṇaiṣa u eṣā citiḥ saiṣā svayaṃ lokampṛṇā citiratha
GV03sb_08_u:1301: yadata ūrdhvamā purīṣātsā ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ sa ṣaṣṭha ṛtuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1303: atha purīṣaṃ nivapati | tatra vikarṇīṃ copadadhāti hiraṇyaśakalaiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1304: prokṣatyagnimabhyādadhāti sā saptamī citiḥ sa saptama ṛtuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1306: tā u vai ṣaḍeva | yaddhi vikarṇī ca svayamātṛṇā ca ṣaṣṭhyā eva tacciteḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1308: tā u vai pañcaiva | yajuṣānyāsu purīṣaṃ nivapati tūṣṇīmatra tenaiṣā na citiratho
GV03sb_08_u:1309: lokampṛṇāntā anyāścitayo bhavanti nātra lokanpṛṇāmupadhāti teno evaiṣā na citiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1311: tā u vai tisra eva | ayameva lokaḥ prathamā citirdyauruttamātha yā
GV03sb_08_u:1312: etāstisrastadantarikṣaṃ tadvā idamekamivaivāntarikṣaṃ tā evaṃ tisra evam pañcaivaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1315: nākasada upadadhāti | devā vai nākasado 'traiṣa sarvo 'gniḥ saṃskṛtaḥ sa eṣo 'tra
GV03sb_08_u:1316: nākaḥ svargo lokastasmindevā asīdaṃstadyadetasminnāke svarge loke devā
GV03sb_08_u:1320: yadveva nākasada upadadhāti | etadvai devā etaṃ nākaṃ svargaṃ lokamapaśyannetā
GV03sb_08_u:1321: stomabhāgāste 'bruvannupa tajjānīta yathāsminnāke svarge loke sīdāmeti te
GV03sb_08_u:1325: te cetayamānāḥ | etā iṣṭakā apaśyannākasadastā upādadhata tābhiretasminnāke svarge
GV03sb_08_u:1330: dikṣūpadadhāti | diśo vai sa nākaḥ svargo lokaḥ svarga evainā etalloke
GV03sb_08_u:1331: sādayatyṛtavyānāṃ velayā saṃvatsaro vā ṛtavyāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ svargo lokaḥ svarga evainā
GV03sb_08_u:1332: etalloke sādayatyantastomabhāgameṣa vai sa nākaḥ svargo lokastasminnevainā
GV03sb_08_u:1335: sa purastādupadadhāti | rājñyati prācī digiti rājñī ha nāmaiṣā prācī digvasavaste
GV03sb_08_u:1336: devā adhipataya iti vasavo haitasya diśo devā adhipatayo 'gnirhetīnām
GV03sb_08_u:1337: pratidhartetyagnirhaivātra haitīnām pratidhartā trivṛttvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ śrayatviti
GV03sb_08_u:1338: trivṛtā haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritājyamukthamavyathāyai stabhnātvityājyena
GV03sb_08_u:1339: haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā rathantaraṃ sāma pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti
GV03sb_08_u:1340: rathantareṇa haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā prathamajā deveṣviti prāṇā
GV03sb_08_u:1341: vā ṛṣayaḥ prathamajāstaddhi brahma prathamajaṃ divo mātrayā varimṇā prathantviti
GV03sb_08_u:1342: yāvatī dyaustāvatīṃ varimṇā prathantvityetadvidhartā cāyamadhipatiśceti vākca tau
GV03sb_08_u:1343: manaśca tau hīdaṃ sarvaṃ vidhārayataste tvā sarve saṃvidānā nākasya pṛṣṭhe svarge
GV03sb_08_u:1344: loke yajamānaṃ ca sādayantviti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1346: atha dakṣiṇataḥ | virāḍasi dakṣiṇā digiti virāḍḍha nāmaiṣā dakṣiṇā digrudrāste
GV03sb_08_u:1347: devā adhipataya iti rudrā haitasya diśo devā adhipataya indro hetīnām
GV03sb_08_u:1348: pratidhartetīndro haivātra hetīnām pratidhartā pañcadaśastvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1349: śrayatviti pañcadaśena haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritā praugamukthamavyathāyai
GV03sb_08_u:1350: stabhnātviti praugeṇa haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā bṛhatsāma
GV03sb_08_u:1351: pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti bṛhatā haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1354: atha paścāt | samrāḍasi pratīcī digiti samrāḍḍha nāmaiṣā pratīci digādityāste devā
GV03sb_08_u:1355: adhipataya ityādityā haitasyai diśo devā adhipatayo varuṇo hetīnām pratidharteti
GV03sb_08_u:1356: varuṇo haivātra hetīnām pratidhartā saptadaśastvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ śrayatviti
GV03sb_08_u:1357: saptadaśena haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritā marutvatīyamukthamavyathāyai
GV03sb_08_u:1358: stabhnātviti marutvatīyena haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā vairūpaṃ sāma
GV03sb_08_u:1359: pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti vairūpeṇa haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1362: athottarataḥ svarāḍasyudīcī digiti svarāḍḍha nāmaiṣodīcī diṅmarutaste devā
GV03sb_08_u:1363: adhipataya iti maruto haitasyai diśo devā adhipatayaḥ somo hetīnām pratidharteti
GV03sb_08_u:1364: somo haivātra hetīnām pratidhartaikaviṃśastvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1365: śrayatvityekaviṃśena haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritā niṣkevalyamukthamavyathāyai
GV03sb_08_u:1366: stabhnātviti niṣkevalyena haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā vai rājaṃ sāma
GV03sb_08_u:1367: pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti vairājena haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1370: atha madhye | adhipatnyasi bṛhatī digityadhipatnī ha nāmaiṣā bṛhatī digviśve te
GV03sb_08_u:1371: devā adhipataya iti viśve haitasyai diśo devā adhipatayo bṛhaspatirhetīnā
GV03sb_08_u:1372: pratidharteti bṛhaspatirhaivātra hetīnām pratidhartā triṇavatrayastriṃśau tvā stomau
GV03sb_08_u:1373: pṛthivyāṃ śrayatāmiti triṇavatrayastriṃśābhyāṃ haiṣā stomābhyām pṛthivyāṃ śritā
GV03sb_08_u:1375: haiṣokthābhyāmavyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā śākvararaivate sāmanī pratiṣṭhityā
GV03sb_08_u:1376: antarikṣa iti śākvararaivatābhyāṃ haiṣā sāmabhyām pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1379: etāvānvai sarvo yajñaḥ | yajña u devānāmātmā yajñameva taddevā ātmānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1383: atha pañcacūḍā upadadhāti | yajño vai nākasado yajña u eva pañcacūḍāstadya ime
GV03sb_08_u:1384: catvāra ṛtvijo gṛhapatipañcamāste nākasado hotrāḥ pañcacūḍā atiriktaṃ vai
GV03sb_08_u:1385: tadyaddhotrā yadu vā atiriktaṃ cūḍaḥ sa tadyatpañcātiriktā tasmātpañcacūḍāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1387: yadveva nākasatpañcacūḍā upadadhāti | ātmā vai nākasado mithunam pañcacūḍā
GV03sb_08_u:1388: ardhamu haitadātmano yanmithunaṃ yadā vai saha mithunenātha sarvo 'tha kṛtsnaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1391: yadveva nākasatpañcacūḍā upadadhāti | ātmā vai nākasadaḥ prajā pañcacūḍā atiriktaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1392: vai tadātmano yatprajā yadu vā atiriktaṃ cūḍaḥ sa
GV03sb_08_u:1395: yadveva nākasatpañcacūḍā upadadhāti | diśo vai nākasado diśa u eva
GV03sb_08_u:1396: pañcacūḍāstadyā amuṣmādādityādarvācyaḥ pañca diśastā nākasado yāḥ parācyastāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1397: pañcacūḍā atiriktā vai tā diśo yā amuṣmādādityātparācyo yadu vā atiriktaṃ cūḍaḥ sa
GV03sb_08_u:1400: yadveva pañcacūḍā upadadhāti | etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na
GV03sb_08_u:1401: imāṃlokānupariṣṭādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etāneṣāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1403: tathaivaitadyajamāna etāneṣāṃ lokānāmupariṣṭādgoptṝ!nkurute ya ete hetayaśca
GV03sb_08_u:1406: sa purastādupadadhāti | ayam puro harikeśa ityagnirvai purastadyattamāha pura iti
GV03sb_08_u:1407: prāñcaṃ hyagnimuddharanti prāñcamupacarantyatha yaddharikeśa ityāha haririva
GV03sb_08_u:1408: hyagniḥ sūryaraśmiriti sūryasyeva hyagne raśmayastasya rathagṛtsaśca rathaujāśca
GV03sb_08_u:1409: senānīgrāmaṇyāviti vāsantikau tāvṛtū puñjikasthalā ca kratusthalā cāpsarasāviti
GV03sb_08_u:1410: dikcopadiśā ceti ha smāha māhitthiḥ senā ca tu te samitiśca daṅkṣṇavaḥ paśavo hetiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1411: pauruṣeyo vadhaḥ prahetiriti yadvai senāyāṃ ca samitau ca'rtīyante daṅkṣṇavaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1412: paśavo hetiḥ pauruṣeyo vadhaḥ prahetiriti yadanyo 'nyaṃ ghnanti sa pauruṣeyo
GV03sb_08_u:1413: vadhaḥ prahetistebhyo namo astviti tebhya eva namaskaroti teno mṛḍayantviti ta
GV03sb_08_u:1414: evāsmai mṛḍayanti te yaṃ dviṣmo yaśca no dveṣṭi tameṣāṃ jambhe dadhma iti
GV03sb_08_u:1415: yameva dveṣṭi yaścainaṃ dveṣṭi tameṣāṃ jambhe dadhātyamumeṣāṃ jambhe
GV03sb_08_u:1416: dadhāmīti ha brūyādyaṃ dviṣyāttato 'ha tasminna punarastyapi tannādriyeta
GV03sb_08_u:1419: atha dakṣiṇataḥ | ayaṃ dakṣiṇā viśvakarmetyayaṃ vai vāyurviśvakarmā yo 'yam
GV03sb_08_u:1420: pavata eṣa hīdaṃ sarvaṃ karoti tadyattamāha dakṣiṇeti tasmādeṣa dakṣiṇaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1421: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ vāti tasya rathasvanaśca rathecitraśca senānīgrāmaṇyāviti graiṣmau
GV03sb_08_u:1422: tāvṛtū menakā ca sahajanyā cāpsarasāviti dikcopadiśā ceti ha smāha māhitthirime tu
GV03sb_08_u:1423: te dyāvāpṛthivī yātudhānā hetī rakṣāṃsi prahetiriti yātudhānā haivātra hetī rakṣāṃsi
GV03sb_08_u:1426: atha paścāt | ayam paścādviśvavyacā ityasau vā ādityo viśvavyacā yadā hyevaiṣa
GV03sb_08_u:1427: udetyathedaṃ sarvaṃ vyaco bhavati tadyattamāha paścāditi tasmādetam
GV03sb_08_u:1428: pratyañcameva yantam paśyanti tasya rathaprotaścāsamarathaśca senānīgrāmaṇyāviti
GV03sb_08_u:1429: vārṣikau tāvṛtū pramlocantī cānumlocantī cāpsarasāviti dikcopadiśā ceti ha smāha
GV03sb_08_u:1430: māhitthirahorātre tu te te hi pra ca mlocato 'nu ca mlocato vyāghrā hetiḥ sarpāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1431: prahetiriti vyāghrā haivātra hetiḥ sarpāḥ prahetistebhyo namo astvititasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1435: yajñaṃ hi saṃyantītīdaṃ vasviti tasya tārkṣyaścāriṣṭanemiśca senānīgrāmaṇyāviti
GV03sb_08_u:1436: śāradau tāvṛtūviśvācī ca ghṛtācī cāpsarasāviti dikcopadiśā ceti ha s māha
GV03sb_08_u:1437: māhitthirvediśca tu te srukca vedireva viśvācī srugghṛtācyāpo hetirvātaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1438: prahetirityāpo haivātra hetirvātaḥ prahetirato hyevoṣṇo vātyataḥ śītastebhyo namo
GV03sb_08_u:1441: atha madhye | ayamuparyarvāgvasuriti parjanyo vā upari tadyattamāhoparītyupari hi
GV03sb_08_u:1442: parjanyo 'tha yadarvāgvasurityāhāto hyarvāgvasu vṛṣṭirannam prajābhyaḥ pradīyate
GV03sb_08_u:1443: tasya senajicca suṣeṇaśca senānīgrāmaṇyāviti haimantikau tāvṛtū urvaśī ca
GV03sb_08_u:1444: pūrvacittiścāpsarasāviti dikcopadiśā ceti ha smāha māhitthirāhutiśca tu te dakṣiṇā
GV03sb_08_u:1448: ete vai te hetayaśca prahetaśca | yāṃstaddevā eṣāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1449: lokānāmupariṣṭādgoptṝnakurvatātha yāstāḥ prajā ete te senānīgrāmaṇyo 'tha
GV03sb_08_u:1450: yattanmithunametāstā apsarasaḥ sarva eva taddevāḥ kṛtsnā bhūtvā saha prajayā saha
GV03sb_08_u:1451: mithunenaitasminnāke svarge loke 'sīdaṃstathaivaitadyajamānaḥ sarva eva kṛtsno
GV03sb_08_u:1452: bhūtvā saha prajayā saha mithunenaitasminnāke svarge loke sīdati
GV03sb_08_u:1454: tā vā etāḥ | daśeṣṭakā upadadhāti daśākṣarā virāḍvirāḍeṣā citistā u vai pañcaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1455: dve-dve hyupadadhāti tā haitā agnerāśiṣastā uttamāyāṃ citā upadadhātyanta eṣo
GV03sb_08_u:1456: 'gneryaduttamā citirantatastadagnerāśiṣo nirāha pañca bhavanti pañca hi yajña āśiṣo
GV03sb_08_u:1457: 'thaine antarā purīṣaṃ nivapatyagnī haitau yadete iṣṭake nedimāvagnī saṃśocāta
GV03sb_08_u:1461: upadadhātyathottarāḥ purastādevāgra upadhāya dakṣiṇata uttarato madhye
GV03sb_08_u:1462: paścādupadadhātyavastātprapadano ha svargo loka etadvai devā imāṃlokāntsarvataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1466: candasyā upadadhāti | atraiṣa sarvo 'gniḥ saṃskṛtaḥ sa eṣo 'tra śriyamaicanno haiṣo
GV03sb_08_u:1468: 'laṃ śriyai dhāraṇāya rājyāya vā grāmaṇīthyāya veti tasmai devā etāṃ śriyam
GV03sb_08_u:1471: tricānyupadadhāti | trivṛdvai paśuḥ pitā mātā putro 'tho garbha ulbaṃ jarāyuatho
GV03sb_08_u:1472: trivṛdvā annaṃ kṛṣirvṛṣṭirvījamekaivāticandā bhavatyekā hyeva sā sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:1473: candāṃsyati sā yā sā śrīrmahattadukthaṃ tadyattanmahadukthametāstāścandasyāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1475: tasya śiro gāyatryaḥ | ātmā triṣṭubho 'nūkaṃ jagatyaḥ pakṣau paṅktayo 'thaitāsāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1476: kakubhāṃ catvāri catvāryakṣarāṇyādāyāticandasyupadadhāti sā sāticandā eva bhavati
GV03sb_08_u:1477: gāyatrya itarāḥ sampadyante saiva gāyatryaśītiryā bṛhatyaḥ sā bārhatī yā uṣṇihaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1478: sauṣṇihyatha yadvaśo yadardharcau yadaindrāgnaṃ yadāvapanaṃ tadaticandā atha
GV03sb_08_u:1481: pratiṣṭhā dvipadāḥ | etāvadvai mahaduktham mahadukthaṃ śrīḥ sarvāmevāsmā etāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1482: devāḥ prāyacaṃstathaivāsmā ayametāṃ sarvāṃ śriyam prayacati
GV03sb_08_u:1484: yadveva candasyā upadadhāti | etadvai devā etaṃ nākaṃ svargaṃ lokamapaśyannetā
GV03sb_08_u:1488: tasya śiro gāyatryaḥ | tā yadgāyatryo bhavanti gāyatraṃ hiśirastisro bhavanti trivṛddhi
GV03sb_08_u:1491: urastriṣṭubhaḥ | tā retaḥsicorvelayopadadhāti pṛṣṭayo vai retaḥsicā uro vai prati
GV03sb_08_u:1494: śroṇī jagatyaḥ | sa yāvati purastātsvayamātṛṇāyai triṣṭubha upadadhāti tāvati
GV03sb_08_u:1495: paścājjagatīryo vā ayam madhye prāṇastadeṣā svayamātṛṇā yāvatyu vā
GV03sb_08_u:1498: sakthyāvanuṣṭubhaḥ | tā anantarhitā jagatībhya upadadhātyanantarhite tacroṇibhyaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1501: parśavo bṛhatyaḥ | kīkasāḥ kakubhaḥ so 'ntareṇa triṣṭubhaśca kakubhaśca
GV03sb_08_u:1502: bṛhatīrupadadhāti tasmādimā ubhayatra parśavo baddhāḥ kīkasāsu ca jatruṣu ca
GV03sb_08_u:1504: grīvā uṣṇihaḥ | tā anantarhitā gāyatrībhya upadadhātyanantarhitāstacīrṣṇo grīvā
GV03sb_08_u:1507: pakṣau paṅktayaḥ | tā yatpaṅktayo bhavanti pāṅktau hi pakṣau pārśvata upadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1508: pārśvato hīmau pakṣau yadvarṣīyaścandastaddakṣiṇata upadadhāti dakṣiṇaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1511: udaramaticandāḥ | paśavo vai candāṃsyannam paśava udaraṃ vā annamattyudaraṃ hi
GV03sb_08_u:1512: vā annamatti tasmādyadodaramannam prāpnotyatha tajjagdhaṃ yātayāmarūpam
GV03sb_08_u:1513: bhavati tadyadeṣā paśūṃścandāṃsyatti tasmādatticandā atticandā ha vai tāmaticandā
GV03sb_08_u:1516: yoniḥ purīṣavatī | te saṃsoṛṣṭe upadadhāti saṃspṛṣṭe hyudaraṃ ca yoniśca
GV03sb_08_u:1517: purīśasaṃhite bhavato māṃsaṃ vai purīṣam māṃsena vā udaraṃ ca yoniśca saṃhite
GV03sb_08_u:1520: te prācyā upadadhāti | prāṅ hyeṣo 'gniścīyate 'tho prāgvai prāca udaram prācī
GV03sb_08_u:1521: yonirbahistomabhāgaṃ hṛdayaṃ vai stomabhāgā hṛdayamu vā uttamathodaramatha
GV03sb_08_u:1524: te dakṣiṇataḥ svayamātṛṇāyā upadadhāti | atha prathamāyāṃ citā uttararaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1525: svayamātṛṇāyā udaraṃ ca yoniṃ copadadhāti yo vā ayam madhye prāṇastadeṣā
GV03sb_08_u:1526: svayamātṛṇaitasya tatprāṇasyobhayata udaraṃ ca yoniṃ ca dadhāti tasmādetasya
GV03sb_08_u:1529: pratiṣṭhā dvipadāḥ | tā yaddvipadā bhavanti dvandvaṃ hi pratiṣṭhā tisro bhavanti
GV03sb_08_u:1532: so 'syaiṣa sukṛta ātmā | tadyasya haitamevaṃ sukṛtamātmānaṃ kurvantyetaṃ ha sa
GV03sb_08_u:1533: sukṛtamātmānamabhisambhavatyatha yasya haitamato 'nyathā kurvanti duṣkṛtaṃ ha
GV03sb_08_u:1534: tasyātmānaṃ kurvanti sa ha sa duṣkṛtamevātmānamabhisambhavati
GV03sb_08_u:1536: tadete sāmanidhane abhyukte | arko devānām parame vyomannarkasya devāḥ parame
GV03sb_08_u:1538: parame vyomannityatha yadāhārkasya devāḥ parame vyomannityayaṃ vā
GV03sb_08_u:1539: agnirarkastasyaitaduttamāyāṃ citau sarve devā viṣṭāstasmādāhārkasya devāḥ parame
GV03sb_08_u:1542: gārhapatyamupadadhāti | etadvai devāḥ prāpya rāddhvevāmanyanta te
GV03sb_08_u:1544: prathamāṃ citimapaśyāma prathamāyai dvitīyāṃ dvitīyāyai tṛtīyāṃ tṛtīyāyai caturthīṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1547: ta 'bruvan | upa tajjānīta yatheyamasmāsveva rāddhirasaditi te
GV03sb_08_u:1552: tasminvyavadanta vasavaḥ purastādrudrā dakṣiṇata ādityāḥ paścānmaruta uttarato
GV03sb_08_u:1555: te 'bruvan | madhya evopadadhāmahai sa no madhya upahitaḥ sarveṣām
GV03sb_08_u:1556: bhaviṣyatīti taṃ madhya upādadhata tadetāṃ rāddhimātmannadadhata madhyato
GV03sb_08_u:1564: yadveva gārhapatyamupadadhāti | vedirvai devaloko 'tha vā eṣa bahirvedi cito
GV03sb_08_u:1565: bhavati taṃ yadihāhṛtyopadadhāti tadenaṃ vedau devaloke pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV03sb_08_u:1567: yadveva gārhapatyamupadadhāti | yonirvai puṣkaraparṇamatha vā eṣa bahiryoni cito
GV03sb_08_u:1568: bhavati bahirdho vā etadyoneragnikarma yatpurā puṣkaraparṇāttaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1569: yadihāhṛtyopadadhāti tadenaṃ yonau puṣkaraparṇe pratiṣṭhāpayati tatho haiṣo
GV03sb_08_u:1570: 'bahirdhā bhavatyaṣṭāviṣṭakā upadadhāti tasyokto bandhustaṃ vā etaireva
GV03sb_08_u:1571: yajurbhiretayāvṛtā cinoti yo hyevāsau sa evāyaṃ tamevaitadāhṛtyehopadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1573: atha punaścitimupadadhāti | etadvai devā gārhapatyaṃ citvā tasminrāddhiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1574: nāpaśyanyonirvai gārhapatyā citireṣo vai yone rāddhiryadretaḥ prajātistasyāmetasyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1577: te 'bruvan | upa tajjānīta yathāsyāṃ yonau retaḥ prajātiṃ dadhāmeti te
GV03sb_08_u:1578: 'bruvaṃścetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvaṃstadicata yathāsyāṃ yonau retaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1581: te cetayamānāḥ | etām punaścitimapaśyaṃstāmupādadhata tadetasyāṃ yonau retaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1584: retaḥ prajātiṃ dadhāti madhyato madhyata evaitadetasyāṃ yonau retaḥ prajātiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1587: tāṃ haike jaghanārdha upadadhati | jaghanārdhādvai retaḥ sicyate pucasaṃdhau
GV03sb_08_u:1588: pucādvai retaḥ sicyata iti na tathā kuryādbahirdhā ha te yone retaḥ prajātiṃ dadhati
GV03sb_08_u:1589: ye tathā kurvanti madhya evopadadhyāttatsamprati yonau retaḥ prajātiṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1592: mātrā tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcati pañca kṛtvaḥ sādayati pañcacitiko 'gniḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1594: tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcatyaṣṭāviṣṭakāḥ pañca kṛtvaḥ sādayati tattrayodaśa
GV03sb_08_u:1604: vā etau gārhapatyaścaivaṃ vā etāvagnī iti na tathā kuryādayaṃ vai loko gārhapatyo
GV03sb_08_u:1607: yadveva gārhapatyaṃ ca punaścitiṃ copadadhāti | vediśca haite agneruttaravediścātha
GV03sb_08_u:1608: ye amū pūrve nivapatyadhvarasya te atha haite agnestadyadete upadhāyāgniṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1611: yadveva punaścitimupadadhāti | punaryajño haiṣa uttarā haiṣā devayajyā
GV03sb_08_u:1615: yadveva punaścitimupadadhāti | yaṃ vai tam prāṇā ṛṣayo 'gre 'gniṃ samaskurvantsa
GV03sb_08_u:1616: eṣa tamevaitatpunaścinoti tadyaccitaṃ santam punaścinoti tasmādveva punaścitiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1618: yena ṛṣayastapasā sattramāyanniti | amūnetadṛṣīnāhendhānā agniṃ svarābharanta
GV03sb_08_u:1619: itīndhānā agniṃ svargaṃ lokamāharanta ityetattasminnahaṃ nidadhe nāke agnimiti
GV03sb_08_u:1620: svargo vai loko nāko yamāhurmanava stīrṇabarhiṣamiti ye vidvāṃsaste manava
GV03sb_08_u:1623: tam patnībhiranugacema devāḥ | putrairbhrātṛbhiruta vā hiraṇyairityetenainaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1624: sarveṇānugacemetyetannākaṃ gṛbhṇānāḥ sukṛtasya loka iti svargo vai loko nākaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1625: svargaṃ lokaṃ gṛhṇānāḥ sukṛtasya loka ityetattṛtīye pṛṣṭhe adhi rocane diva
GV03sb_08_u:1626: ityetaddha tṛtīyam pṛṣṭhaṃ rocanaṃ divo yatraiṣa etattapati
GV03sb_08_u:1628: ā vāco madhyamaruhadbhuraṇyuriti | etaddha vāco madhyaṃ yatraiṣa etaccīyate
GV03sb_08_u:1630: pratiścetayamāna ityetatpṛṣṭhe pṛthivyā nihito davidyutaditi pṛṣṭhe pṛthivyā nihito
GV03sb_08_u:1631: dīpyamāna ityetadadhaspadaṃ kṛṇutāṃ ye pṛtanyava ityadhaspadaṃ kurutāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1634: ayamagnirvīratamo vayodhā iti | ayamagnirvīryavattamo vayodhā ityetatsahasriyo
GV03sb_08_u:1636: madhya itīme vai lokāḥ sariraṃ dīpyamāna eṣu lokeṣvityetadupa pratyāhi divyāni
GV03sb_08_u:1640: pracyavadhvamupa cainaṃ samprayātetyagne patho devayānānkṛṇudhvamiti yathaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1641: yajustathā bandhuḥ punaḥ kṛṇvānā pitarā yuvāneti vākca vai manaśca pitarā yuvānā
GV03sb_08_u:1645: udbudhyasvāgne pratijāgṛhi tvamiti | imametadagnimāhoccainam budhyasva prati
GV03sb_08_u:1646: cainaṃ jāgṛhītīṣṭāpūrte saṃsṛjethāmayaṃ ceti yathaiva yajustathā
GV03sb_08_u:1647: bandhurasmintsadhasthe adhyuttarasminniti dyaurvā uttaraṃ sadhasthaṃ viśve devā
GV03sb_08_u:1648: yajamānaśca sīdateti tadviśvairdevaiḥ saha yajamānaṃ sādayati
GV03sb_08_u:1650: yena vahasi sahasram | yenāgne sarvavedasamityetaddhāsya pratijñātatamaṃ dhāma
GV03sb_08_u:1651: yena sahasraṃ vahati yena sarvavedasaṃ tenemaṃ yajñaṃ no naya svardeveṣu gantava
GV03sb_08_u:1652: iti tena na imaṃ yajñaṃ naya svargaṃ lokaṃ deveṣu gantava ityetadayaṃ te
GV03sb_08_u:1653: yonirṛtviya iti tasyokto bandhuraṣṭāviṣṭakā upadadhāti tasyo evoktaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1655: ṛtavyā upadadhāti | ṛtava ete yadṛtavyā ṛtūnevaitadupadadhāti tadetatsarvaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1656: yadṛtavyāḥ saṃvatsaro vā ṛtavyāḥ saṃvatsara idaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1660: yadveva 'rtavyā upadadhāti | kṣatra vā ṛtavyā viśa imā itarā iṣṭakāḥ kṣatraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1661: tadviśyattāraṃ dadhāti tāḥ sarvāsu citiṣūpadadhāti sarvasyāṃ tadviśi kṣatramattāraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1664: yadveva 'rtavyā upadadhāti | saṃvatsara eṣo 'gniḥ sa ṛtavyābhiḥ saṃhitaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1665: saṃvatsaramevaitadṛtubhiḥ saṃtanoti saṃdadhāti tā vai nānāprabhṛtayaḥ samānodarkā
GV03sb_08_u:1666: ṛtavo vā asṛjyanta te sṛṣṭā nānaivāsan
GV03sb_08_u:1668: te 'bruvan | na vā itthaṃ santaḥ śakṣyāmaḥ prajanayituṃ rūpaiḥ samāyāmeti ta
GV03sb_08_u:1669: ekaikamṛtuṃ rūpaiḥ samāyaṃstasmādekaikasminnṛtau sarveṣāmṛtūnāṃ rūpaṃ tā
GV03sb_08_u:1670: yannānāprabhṛtayo nānā hyasṛjyantātha yatsamānodarkā rūpairhi samāyan
GV03sb_08_u:1672: sa upadadhāti | tapaśca tapasyaśca śaiśirāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine
GV03sb_08_u:1676: agnerantaḥśleṣo 'sīti | saṃvatsara eṣo 'gniḥ sa ṛtavyābhiḥ saṃhitaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1677: saṃvatsaramevaitadṛtubhiḥ saṃtanoti saṃdadhāti kalpetāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī kalpantāmāpa
GV03sb_08_u:1679: jyaiṣṭhyāya savratā ityagnayo haite pṛthagyadetā iṣṭakāste
GV03sb_08_u:1681: dyāvāpṛthivī ime iti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ śaiśirāvṛtū abhikalpamānā
GV03sb_08_u:1682: indramiva devā abhisaṃviśantviti yathendraṃ devā abhisaṃviṣṭā evamimāvṛtū
GV03sb_08_u:1683: jyaiṣṭhyāyābhisaṃviśantvityetaddve iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1686: tadyadete atropadadhāti | saṃvatsara eṣo 'gnirima u lokāḥ saṃvatsarastasya dyaureva
GV03sb_08_u:1687: pañcamī citirdyaurasya śiśira ṛtustadyadete atropadadhāti yadevāsyaite
GV03sb_08_u:1690: yadvevaite atropadadhāti | prajāpatireṣo 'gniḥ saṃvatsara u prajāpatistasya śira eva
GV03sb_08_u:1691: pañcamī citiḥ śiro 'sya śiśira ṛtustadyadete atropadadhāti yadevāsyaite
GV03sb_08_u:1694: sa purastātsvayamātṛṇāyai ca viśvajyotiṣaśca 'rtavye upadadhāti | dyaurvā uttamā
GV03sb_08_u:1697: prajananaṃ dadhāti tasmādarvācīnamevātaḥ prajāyate sthitaṃ haivātaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1698: parākprajananaṃ yāvanto hyeva sanāgre devāstāvanto devāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1700: atha prathamāyai svayamātṛṇāyai prathamāyai ca viśvajyotiṣa upariṣṭādṛtavye
GV03sb_08_u:1701: upadadhāti | iyaṃ vai prathamā svayamātṛṇāgniḥ prathamā
GV03sb_08_u:1703: prajananametaditastadūrdhvam prajananaṃ dadhāti tasmādita ūrdhvameva prajāyate
GV03sb_08_u:1705: tā na vyūhet | nedṛtūnvyūhānīti yo vai mriyata ṛtavo ha tasmai vyuhyante
GV03sb_08_u:1708: atho ime vai lokā ṛtavyāḥ | imāṃstallokānūrdhvāṃścitibhiścinotyatho kṣatraṃ vā
GV03sb_08_u:1709: ṛtavyāḥ kṣatraṃ tadūrdhvaṃ citibhiścinotyatho saṃvatsaro vā ṛtavyāḥ saṃvatsaraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1713: tā haitā eva saṃyānyaḥ | etadvai devā
GV03sb_08_u:1717: tadu ha carakādhvaryavaḥ | anyā eva saṃyānīrityupadadhati na tathā kuryādatyahaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1720: atha viśvajyotiṣamupadadhāti | ādityo vā uttamā viśvajyotirādityo hyevāmuṣmiṃloke
GV03sb_08_u:1723: yadveva viśvajyotiṣamupadadhāti | prajā vai viśvajyotiḥ prajā hyeva viśvaṃ jyotiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1727: svayamātṛṇāditya uttamā viśvajyotirarvācīnaṃ taddiva ādityaṃ dadhāti tasmādeṣo
GV03sb_08_u:1737: vai madhyamā svayamātṛṇā vāyurmadhyamā viśvajyotirantarikṣe tadvāyuṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1740: tānyetāni jyotīṃṣi | tadyadetā evamupadadhātyetānyevaitajjyotīṃṣi samyañci dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1743: parameṣṭhī tvā sādayatviti | parameṣṭhī hyetām pañcamīṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1744: citimapaśyaddivaspṛṣṭhe jyotiṣmatīmiti divo hyasau pṛṣṭhe jyotiṣmānādityaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1746: viśvasmai prāṇāyāpānāya | vyānāyeti prāṇo vai viśvajyotiḥ sarvasmā u vā etasmai
GV03sb_08_u:1748: viśvaṃ jyotiryaceti sarvaṃ jyotiryacetyetatsūryaste 'dhipatiriti sūryamevāsyā adhipatiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1751: tā haitā eva saṃyānyaḥ | etadvai devā
GV03sb_08_u:1755: tadu ha carakādhvaryavo | 'nyā eva saṃyānīrityupadadhati na tathā kuryādatyahaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1758: atha lokampṛṇāmupadadhāti | asau vā ādityo lokampṛṇaiṣa
GV03sb_08_u:1760: vai lokā etāścitayo 'muṃ tadādityameṣu lokeṣu dadhāti tasmādeṣa sarvebhya
GV03sb_08_u:1763: yadveva lokampṛṇāmupadadhāti | kṣatraṃ vai lokampṛṇā viśa imā itarā iṣṭakāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1764: kṣatraṃ tadviśyattāraṃ dadhāti tāṃ sarvāsu citiṣūpadadhāti sarvasyāṃ tadviśi
GV03sb_08_u:1767: saiṣaikaiva bhavati | ekasthaṃ tatkṣatramekasthāṃ śriyaṃ karotyatha yā dvitīyā
GV03sb_08_u:1768: mithunaṃ tadardhamu haitadātmano yanmithunaṃ yadā vai saha mithunenātha sarvo
GV03sb_08_u:1769: 'tha kṛtsnaḥ kṛtsnatāyā ekena yajuṣā bahvīriṣṭakā upadadhāti kṣatraṃ
